After each won match there is also a challenge that can be played to increase the money earned.

The game looks and plays similarly to Gameloft's Midnight Pool games. Aiming is done by rotating the cue around the ball and lines indicate how the balls will move. When taking a shot a meter appears which is used to set the power. There are also advanced controls which can be used to add spin to the ball.
title: Jimmy White Snooker Legend

description:
Let's Go Bowling is a bowling game for mobile devices. It is similar to the Midnight Bowling series from the same company and has the same game mechanics. To launch the ball, the player sets the position, the power and the aiming. Thereafter it is possible to add spin by moving the ball left and right as it rolls towards the pins.

The main game mode is the career, but there is also an instant play mode and a free mode. The career mode consists of five locations that have to be unlocked in order. Each location has a number of events and in each the player has to earn stars by completing objectives. Once enough stars have been earned it is possible to move on to the next location. By competing in the events the player earns new equipment which improve the capabilities of the character and experience points which can be used to improve three categories: strength, accuracy and spin.
title: Let's Go Bowling

description: The mobile version of DiRT is a racing game played from a behind view. It contains a career mode as well as a rally world section which consists of quick races, challenges and exhibitions. The main part of the game is the career mode where the player if successful unlocks new cars to be used in the rally world section. The career mode involves completing tracks in successive order. Each track involves competing against three opposing drivers in a best of three laps race. By winning the race a new track and a new car is unlocked.
title: DiRT

description: Holden Racing Team Championship 2004 is a racing game that is based on the Australian racing team that competes in the Supercars Championship. The player can choose to play as one of two real life drivers, Mark Skaife and Todd Kelly, in three different game modes. There is an arcade mode with races against three opponents in a quick race, a championship with six tracks and seven opponents and a time trial where the player has to beat the best time for each track. The game is played from a third person behind view perspective. The controls are quite simple and are limited to steering and changing gear. The car automatically moves forward.
title: Holden Racing Team Championship 2004

description: In AD 1066 you take control of armies of William the Conqueror, the first Norman king of England, who invaded the country in mid 10th century and effectively seized control at the end of 1066. The game is a fast-paced turn-based strategy played on a hex field. You can recruit armies, conquer cities and wage tactical battles. There are nine types of units that can grow with experience, nine types of terrain tiles with different combat bonuses and ten leaders that can enhance your core units. The path to Hastings takes you through thirteen different maps. Also there's a hot-seat multiplayer.
title: AD 1066

description: 4 Xmas is a falling blocks puzzle game with a Christmas theme. The aim of the game is to clear Christmas balls that fall from the top of the screen. Each ball has one of four letters (X, M, A, S) and they has to be combined so that the word Xmas is created and the balls are then eliminated from the screen. Chains can be created vertically, horizontally or in any shape as long as the letters are connect adjacently in the right order. It is also possible to create multiple chains and combos. Some special events affect the game such as rising and falling snow levels which influence the difficulty, special balls that act as jokers and the possibility to launch the Grinch which can crash through balls.
title: 4 Xmas

description: Santa Quest is a 3D platform game played from a behind view perspective. The aim of the game is simply to get Santa across a number of platforms (including some that are moving), collect as many Christmas presents as possible and reach an exit. Falling of a platform leads to a life being lost and the game ends when all lives have been lost. Controls simply involve moving around and jumping.
title: Santa Quest

description: Santa Claus X is a Christmas themed Boulder Dash variant. All of Santa Claus' presents have been stolen by penguins and are now hidden all over Antarctica. The aim of the game is simply to collect all the presents by clearing a road through the snow while avoiding getting crushed by falling snow lumps. It is also necessary to avoid penguins and the green acid that they have spilled, which eats everything in its way.
title: Santa Claus X

description: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas is a mobile game based on the movie with the same name. It is a puzzle game viewed from a top down perspective where the player controls Jack Skellington who has to collect all the presents in each level. When done a sack opens and Jack can leave the level by moving to it. To reach the presents pumpkins have to be pushed around to clear a path. There are some enemies that chase the player around but who can't cross snow. Skeletons can be stunned by throwing a bone while witches have to be lured into a trap. Any contact with either leads to the player having to restart the level.

sample_screenshots.caption: Knocking out skeleton with a bone

title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas

description:
Everybody's Golf Mobile is a mobile game based on Sony's console game series which is known as Hot Shots Golf in North America. Like in other golf games shots are taken from a behind view but unlike the console games this version uses sprite based 2D graphics. First the player is presented with an overhead view of the playfield where the direction of the drive is set. Shots are taken by hitting a button when a bar starts filling to set the power and then once again when a yellow mark crosses a white line to set the aim. There is also an easy mode where only the force of the strike needs to be set.

The game consists of three modes of play: tournament, training and challenge. The tournament features nine contestants who compete for skills and points are given based on results. The training mode is for practising and testing out clubs. By performing well the player earns points which can be used to buy clubs and balls that increase the character's skills. By completing challenges, new characters can be unlocked.
title: Everybody's Golf: Mobile

description: Trance Pinball is a pinball game where the tables are inspired by popular Taito games such as Space Invaders or Arkanoid. You unlock new music tracks as you progress in the game and create a richer sound environment this way.
title: Trance Pinball

description:
Rockman GP is a racing game for mobile phones, based on the Rockman series, which is known as the Mega Man series outside of Asia. The game has three playable characters: Rockman (Mega Man), Roll, and Forte (Bass).

Like Mega Man: Battle & Chase, it is possible to use weapons on opponents during VS. mode. There is also a Time Limit Mode, where the goal is to cross checkpoints within the allotted amount of time.
title: Rockman GP

description:
Real Soccer 2007 is the fourth entry in Gameloft's annual series of mobile football games. Like previous games in the series the game is played from an isometric birds eye view and has the same basic controls but with some new moves being possible. This include performing lobs, flip-flap tricks and one-two passing.

Real Soccer 2007 carries a FIFPRO licence which means that it features real life players but it does not have any real team or competition names. The game modes include friendlies, cups, leagues, penalty kicks and training. There are three different leagues and three different cups including an international cup based on the 2006 World Cup.
title: Real Soccer 2007

description: Real Soccer 2007 3D is the second 3D game in the Real Football series. It features similar content and mechanics to the 2D version and differs mainly in appearance. Instead of the isometric graphics the game is viewed either from the side of the pitch or a behind view that follows the ball holder. The game modes included are also the same: friendlies, cups, leagues, penalty kicks and training. There are three different cups and three different leagues. Both club and international teams are featured.
title: Real Soccer 2007 3D

description:
Real Soccer 2008 is the fifth entry in Gameloft's annual series of mobile football games. The gameplay in this edition is mostly identical to the previous iteration. It is played from an isometric birds eye view and has the same controls with the same moves being possible to do. This includes performing lobs, flip-flap tricks and one-two passing.

Like before the game has a FIFPRO licence which means that it features real life players but it does not have any real team or competition names. In addition to the common friendlies, cups and leagues the game adds two new game modes. There is the Road to 2008 which involves qualifying for and competing in the Euro 2008 and there is a challenge mode where the player has to complete objectives. For example, the first challenge is the World Cup 2006 final and the player takes control of France after Zinedine Zidane is sent off with the objective of winning the final.
title: Real Soccer 2008

description:
Real Football: Manager Edition is the first in a series of management spin-offs in the Real Football series. Its release coincided with the 2007/2008 season and features the top two leagues from five European countries: England, Italy, Spain, France and Germany. There are real players but no real team names so for example Arsenal is called London and Manchester United is simply Man. Red. There are about 4,000 players each with individual stats in 14 categories.

Similar to other football management games the player is in control of picking a team and tactics, designing a training plan, buying and selling players as well as hiring coaches and scouts. Tactics can be set for both the team as a whole as well for individual players. The game uses the isometric Real Football match engine which allows the player to watch the full 90 minutes of a game. It is also possible to change to an overhead view or a stats display during the game.
title: Real Football: Manager Edition

description:
Galaxian Mini is a version of the classic game for mobile phones, primarily Nokia, Motorola and Sharp models, specifically those with WAP settings, connected to the UK's Vodaphone, O2, Orange, T-Mobile and Virgin Mobile networks.

The product must be registered before it can be played, to do this the player sends a text containing the sixteen character key found inside the 'Games Booklet' together with a network code and a handset code. which also explains how the game is played.

The game itself is downloaded, the accompanying CD contains adverts for some of Digital Bridges' other mobile games

  • Space Invaders
  • XS Snowboarding
  • Tiger Woods PGA Tour Golf 2004
  • Denki Blocks!
  • Puzzle Bobble
  • EA Sports FIFA Football 2003: Mobile International Edition
  • and Men In Black II

together with eight playable polyphonic ringtones to celebrate fifty years of the UK pop charts and a free copy of Digimask software which is used to make 3D models of a persons head.
title: Galaxian Mini

description:
Real Rugby is a rugby game similar to the same company's Real Football series. Like those games it is played using an isometric perspective and has similar graphics. When having the ball running is automatic and the player simply steers left and right. It's possible to sprint but only until stamina runs out. Passing and diving over the line is done with a single button which when held or pressed down at the right moment is also used for mauls and line-outs. Conversion kicks are done from a first person perspective and uses a power meter to set the strength of the kick.

The game contains four game modes: friendlies, tournaments, leagues, training and mini-game. There are four tournaments (International Cup, Euro 6, South Cup and Euro Clubs Cup) and six leagues (World, Euro, South, French, English and Isles). The mini-game consists of a sequence of kicks where the player earns points for each score. It ends when a kick is missed.
title: Real Rugby

description:
Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Extended Ops is a sequel to the original mobile game in the Splinter Cell series. Like the first game it is a stealth based platformer played from a side view. The player takes control of Sam Fisher who has to infiltrate a deserted ex-Soviet military bases which has become active again and find out what is going on.

The game consists of six linear levels which are finished when the exit is reached. Guards can be sneaked past or be taken out by firing, strangling or jumping onto them. It is also possible to hold a guard hostage. In addition to the regular gun the player also gets access to flash grenades and a sniper rifle. Next to the guards there are also mines, security cameras, laser sensors and turrets to watch out for.

sample_screenshots.caption: Guards can be pushed onto the sensors

title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Extended Ops

description: Block and Score Soccer is a strategy game that is loosely based on football. It is played by two opponents who each have their own sets of fourteen balls that are placed in identical patterns on the field. The aim of the game is to score points by kicking balls off the field on the opponent's side of the field. At the same time, those balls that remain have to be used to block the shots of the opponent. The players take turns kicking one ball at a time and the ball always moves in a straight line until it hits another ball or goes over the sideline. Balls can be kicked in any direction but not if there is another ball immediately next to it in that direction. The game goes until neither opponent can make another move.
title: Block and Score Soccer

description:
Wizardry: Chapter 1 is a mobile game based on the long running Wizardry RPG series. The game starts with the player waking up in a cell with a hangover and no idea what has happened. A guard explains that he has rampaged an inn and attacked the mayor's son who now wants the player's head. However, the town's sewers need to be cleaned out and the player can please the mayor by accepting the task.

The game starts with the player creating a character which is done by choosing a class (fighter, mage, priest or thief) and a race (dwarf, elf, halfling, gnome or human). Unlike other games in the series, only one character is created at the start but more can be added to the party by talking to NPCs. Each character has stats in four categories: strength, luck, defense and attack and these increase automatically when levelling up. Experience is earned by winning battles and solving tasks and to level up the player has to visit the character's guild.

Similar to other Wizardry games, the player explores the game world from a first person perspective, but when combat begins, it changes to a side view with enemies on the left and party members on the right. Actions for each character are selected from a menu with five options: fight, defense, herbs, spell and flee. The combat is turn based like in other Wizardry games.

sample_screenshots.caption: Another battle, against more vicious looking slimes

title: Wizardry: Chapter 1

description: Friday the 13th is an adventure game based on the horror movie series of the same name. As a female camp counselor, the player has to survive the massacre that Jason Voorhees wreaks upon the camp by collecting items, helping people and solving puzzles.

sample_screenshots.caption: Hitching a ride to the camp
Entering Camp Crystal Lake... Camp Blood!

title: Friday the 13th

description: Ice Age is based on the cartoon movie of the same name. The main character is a squirrel gathering acorns, and it looks like somebody has put them on different banks of the river. You have to jump over the ice floes to get to them.
title: Ice Age

description: Ōban Star-Racers is a futuristic racing game based on the French-Japanese animated series of the same name. The game follows the story of the show, where various racers from across the universe compete in the Great Race of Ōban for a chance at winning "The Ultimate Prize". In the game you pilot the Earth team's ship, the Whizzing Arrow, piloted by Molly and Jordan. During races, you control you ship using your phones keypad, the 4 and 6 buttons turn your ship, the 2 and 8 buttons change your altitude, and the 5 button fires your weapon. Between races there a short story segments that follow condensed scenes from the show, during these segments there are points where you can choose what to say. How you respond during these segments affects the moral of your pilots going into the following race, which affect certain abilities. The moral of Molly affect how long your hyperdrive will last, and the moral of Jordan will affect the power of your weapons.
title: Ōban Star-Racers: The Arouas Cycle

description: Radiohitz! Guess That Song was an online trivia game designed as a game show where players had to answer questions regarding pop music trivia. After listening to short clips the players had to name the tune or the artist. None of the clips were included with the game; instead, the player had to connect to the game's servers and stream the music to the phone at the start of each game. The game was also early in using micro transactions with additional packs of songs being available to buy.
title: Radiohitz! Guess That Song

description: This is a feature phone version of Tetris. It contains a marathon mode which works like classic Tetris and a campaign mode which is made up of a number of shorter levels. It contains seven locations with ten levels in each. Stars are awarded for completed levels and are required to unlock new locations. There are four different level types: time attack where a target has to be reached in a limited time, rising mode where additional incomplete lines appear, zombie infection where zombies infect adjacent cells and eats blocks and puzzle where imprisoned stars have to be rescued in a limited number of drops. Various power-ups and obstacles will appear such as a ghost block which moves through the matrix and fills in holes and a rain of blocks that falls randomly.

sample_screenshots.caption: Each campaign level has its own starting blocks

title: Tetris

description: The J2ME version of Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars has little truly in common with its computer and console counterpart save for the universe it is in. Untrue to the franchise, it is a turn-based game split in two phases – base construction and combat. It is set during the Third Tiberium War, and features GDI and Nod units, albeit certain Nod units are reskins of GDI counterparts due to technical limitations. It has only a GDI singleplayer campaign.
title: Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars

description:
Much like its contemporary and better-known iOS counterpart, the J2ME release of Command & Conquer: Red Alert is set between the events of Command & Conquer: Yuri's Revenge and Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3.

However, unlike the J2ME version of Command & Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars, this game is entirely set in real time and operates in a similar way to the mainline games on personal computers, meaning that base building and battles are no longer separated in turn-based phases and instead occur simultaneously. The game has 8 Soviet and 7 Allied campaign missions, as well as 4 skirmish maps.

Unlike the iOS version, the J2ME release of Command & Conquer: Red Alert never got an update with the Empire of the Rising Sun faction.
title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert

description:
The J2ME release of Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight mimicks the general gameplay of its computer-based counterpart in that it too discards the standard real-time strategy gameplay in favour of real-time tactics. One of the differences is that Crawlers do not need to deploy to construct units, but due to the smaller scale of mobile hardware at the time, unit population caps were even lower than in the Windows version.

There are 6 missions for GDI and 6 missions for Nod, and what little plot there is is separate from the storyline in the Windows release.
title: Command & Conquer 4: Tiberian Twilight

description:
This mobile game is based on the movie of the same name. The player is in control of main character, who is trying to make the public appreciate him more.

Do a bad thing like destroying a kid's kite and you get minus points. Do a good thing like putting out a fire or catching a robber - and you get positive points. Hancock can freely fly around what is visible on screen. The camera goes through the level from left to right in side scroller fashion.
title: Hancock: The Mobile Game

description: This movie tie-in has the player controlling The Big Lebowkski's The Dude. The player bowls against ten different opponents in a setting based on the the film's bowling alley. In between rounds, the player is able to fix The Dude a White Russian.
title: The Big Lebowski Bowling

description: Real Tournament is a 2D platformer that plays like an arena shooter. There can be up to four players on the map, of which three are bots. Supported game modes are Deathmatch and Capture The Flag. In addition to several weapons, players can use flying hoverbikes. There is no campaign and no setting or plot.
title: Real Tournament

description:
Spider-Man vs Doc Ock is one of several mobile games based on the film Spider-Man 2. It consists of three stages with different gameplay in each. The first one is a side scrolling platform level with automatic running. Two buttons are used: one for swinging between rooftops and one for shooting a web at enemies standing in the way.

In the second stage Spider-Man runs through a subway tunnel and has to avoid oncoming trains. It's possible to jump up to the ceiling to avoid the trains but it is necessary to jump back down to avoid hitting a barrier. The third and final stage is a battle against Doc Ock. He attacks with his mechanical arms which Spider-Man has to web up. Once all arms are webbed it is possible to capture the villain. Once all stages have been completed the game restarts at a higher difficulty.
title: Spider-Man vs Doc Ock

description: Hangman Deluxe + Bluetooth is a mobile game based on the classic word guessing game. The player is given a hidden word that has to be figured out by entering letters one at a time. For every erroneous guess a new part of the hangman is drawn until the picture is completed and the game is lost. The game can be played in single player or against another player over bluetooth. There are four categories of words to choose from: science, culture, sports and leisure.
title: Hangman Deluxe + Bluetooth

description: Ronaldinho Gaucho: Bubbles is a Puzzle Bobble variant featuring the Brazilian football player Ronaldinho. After training there are balls all around the pitch and the player has to help Ronaldinho tidy things up. The player has to kick balls onto the balls on the pitch to create clusters of three or more balls of the same colour so that they are removed. The aim of each level is to clear all balls from the screen. The game is over when balls reach the bottom of the screen.
title: Ronaldinho Gaúcho: Bubbles

description: Ronaldinho Gaucho: Tricks is a Tetris variant featuring the Brazilian football player Ronaldinho. The game plays like any game of Tetris with blocks falling that has to arranged so that lines are formed and the blocks are cleared. One addition to this game is the bomb piece which appears when increasing in level and explodes and clears blocks upon contact.
title: Ronaldinho Gaúcho: Tricks

description: Ronaldinho Gaucho: Kicks is a Puzz Loop/Zuma variant featuring the Brazilian footballer Ronaldinho. The gameplay works the same as other variants of its kind. Footballs of different colours move along a trail leading to a goal. The player's task is to prevent them from reaching the goal and this is done by shooting more balls at the trail. Balls are removed from the trail when clusters of three or more balls are created. A level is completed once there are no balls left on the trail.
title: Ronaldinho Gaúcho: Kicks

description: Ronaldinho Gaucho: Goal! is a mobile game starring the Brazilian football player Ronaldinho. The game is a maze game where Ronaldinho has to reach all flags in each level. Meanwhile there are opponents running after him that have to be avoided. In the maze there is also a ball which can be collected and used to confuse the opponents. By kicking it at them they are stunned for a short while.
title: Ronaldinho Gaúcho: Goal!

description: Ronaldinho Gaúcho: Street Soccer is a football game featuring Brazilian football star Ronaldinho. The game is played from a top down perspective and uses simple controls where a single button is used to shoot, pass and tackle. Only fictional teams are included in the game. The player's team is called Porto Alegre (Ronaldinho's hometown) and they get to compete in single matches against six other fictional teams. Only single matches can be played. There are no cups, leagues or other tournaments included. At the end of each game the player is given a highscore rating.
title: Ronaldinho Gaúcho: Street Soccer

description: Ministry of Sound: Club Manager is a management simulation game where the player takes the role of a club owner and DJ. As the manager the player has to hire staff (bartenders and bouncers), buy supplies (beer and spirits) and new club features (such as bars and dance floors), adjust prices, buy advertisements and hire DJs. The player can hire one DJ for each night of the week and personally DJ one night per week. All this is done weekly and then the full week is simulated night by night. When playing as the DJ the game plays like a rhythm action game where the right arrows have to be pushed in sequence. After making some money it is also possible to release records and conduct tours.
title: Ministry of Sound: Club Manager

description:
Psychic Fantasy is a roguelike RPG for mobile phones. In 2053, in a town called City Z located on the moon a computer goes out of control and starts destroying the city. Players take the role of a scientist who has decided to destroy the RuneX computer.

The combat is turn-based and usually players will get to fight one enemy per battle. Sometimes monsters can summon allies to assist them in combat. The game doesn't tell players how many experience points they've acquired after combat, it only tells which skills were improved and how much gold was acquired. Players may also buy medicine and goods that will increase their skills. Weapons can be found in the monster infested areas inside chests. Some weapons, such as guns require AP to fire them. All the monster infested areas are randomly generated and finding a stairway will transfer players to the next area. Players can always return to the city by using a Lunar Car found in the beginning of each new map.

sample_screenshots.caption: You can save the game at any time.
You must save the city on the moon, duh!

title: Psychic Fantasy

description:
Shinobi is, in essence, a reimagining of the arcade classic for mobile phones. While the levels and the gameplay remain unchanged (Save for the main character being able to take 3 hits before dying) a backstory was added to justify the inclusion of 2 playable characters.

Two ninjas, while undergoing training, stumbled upon a secret organization plotting to take over the ninja world. Both ninjas set out to rescue the captured ninjas and destroy the organization.

Although there were no changes made to the core gameplay, all the graphics have been redrawn with the main character being based on Hotsuma from the PS2 game. The bosses have had their names changed. The children that Joe Musashi had to save in the original game were changed to female ninjas. The controls were adapted for mobile phones so jumping to the platform above is done by holding the jump button.

The game offers the option of saving it after completing each stage and in some stages players may find books dropped by the enemies. Collecting all the books will unlock a third, hidden character.

There are 3 difficulty levels in the game with only the Easy mode being available from the get-go. The Normal and Hard modes can be unlocked after a complete successful playthrough. Completing the game once also unlocks a Challenge mode where the player must survive as long as possible in the shuriken throwing bonus stage.

sample_screenshots.caption: Clearing a stage brings us to the Save menu.
The sword is also available for short-range attacks.

title: Shinobi

description:
Air Strike 1944 is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up similar to Gameloft's earlier Siberian Strike series which it also shares characters with. Although the game takes place in war time Europe, it is a highly fictional take on World War II with the objective being to save the continent from the dictator Darkstein. The game starts out in England with the player having to liberate London before moving through an underwater tunnel to Normandy. Ultimately the aim is to reach Darkstein's castle and hidden hidden base in Germany.

The gameplay is almost identical to the Siberian Strike games. By destroying enemies power ups that increase fire power and medals that give extra points can be collected. Other pick ups include shields, missiles attacks and extra lives. In addition to regular fire the player also has access to a mega bomb that kills everything on the screen. The game has a total of nine levels, some of which end with a boss fight. There are also a few slalom levels where the player has to maneuver through tunnels without crashing.
title: Air Strike 1944: Flight for Freedom

description: Block Breaker is a Breakout variant for early mobile phones and a predecessor to the more well known Block Breaker Deluxe. The game plays like any other Breakout game with the player controlling a paddle that is used to hit a ball in an attempt to destroy blocks that are located at the upper part of the screen. Like other post Arkanoid variants the game has a number of power ups. These include multiplying the balls, changing the size of the paddle and the ability to fire rockets. There are seven power ups in total and the game consists of 30 levels.
title: Block Breaker

description:
Derek Jeter Pro Baseball 2005 is the first entry in Gameloft's annual baseball game series. The game features both batting and pitching as well as fielding and running. When batting or pitching the game uses a behind view of the batter which when the ball is hit switches to a bird's view perspective. Pitching is done by choosing one of four pitch types and then moving a cursor over the strike zone. Batting involves timing the swing as the ball reaches the strike zone with dedicated keys for fly balls, grounders and aiming left or right. When defending fielders can dive or jump after the ball and throwing is done by entering the number of one of the bases.

The game has four game modes: quick plays, exhibition games, seasons and playoffs. Other than Derek Jeter himself, none of the teams or players are licensed. The season can be played with either 29 or 58 games and it's possible to simulate matches without playing them. Some minor management options exist with the player being able to change the team's lineup and the pitching rotation.
title: Derek Jeter Pro Baseball 2005

description:
Derek Jeter Pro Baseball 2007 is the third entry in Gameloft's annual baseball game series. The game mechanics are essentially the same as in the previous year's edition and involves all the elements of the sport: pitching, batting, fielding and running. The main differences lie in the presentation as it features a new game engine that utilizes an isometric perspective of the ball park.

The included game modes are exhibition games, seasons, playoffs and homerun derbies. Like in previous games, Derek Jeter is the only licensed player. Other players are made up and teams are only named after their location. The season can be played with either 29 or 58 games and it's possible to simulate matches without playing them. Some minor management options exist with the player being able to change the team's lineup and the pitching rotation.
title: Derek Jeter Pro Baseball 2007

description:
Blades & Magic is a 3D RPG for mobile phones. Players take the role of Bryn, a young warrior of the Grimblade Clan whose parents were slaughtered by an evil orc and he goes on a quest to avenge their deaths and stop their leader, Balrazhul, from taking over the land.

The game is divided into 9 chapters and most of the gameplay occurs on a map. Players travel to different areas through the map and are attacked by enemies during their travels. With each step that players take, they are given a choice of examining their surroundings, visiting merchants and taverns in cities or continuing the chapter by visiting places they have to be in according to the main quest. Players may also accept side-quests to gain money and accessories that will aid them in battle.

The combat switches to a 3D mode and is turn-based with players being able to assign up to 5 consecutive actions. Players can purchase and use different kinds of weapons, as well as magic spells in combat.

sample_screenshots.caption: Your master offers you to test your strength.
The camera shows our protagonist or his back when he wins the battle.
Let's try it out on these bats!
In the beginning, our character can miss quite a few attacks.

title: Blades & Magic

description:
Skate & Slam is a skateboarding game which makes players perform tricks on the streets of San Francisco and Venice Beach while their female agent is shooting a video of them skating.

The game features 6 levels which are divided into two parts: the first part has players try different kinds of tricks to get a specific score which will help them find a sponsor. The second part has players go through the same level and get a specific score by using only one type of trick to please the sponsor. As soon as players complete all 6 levels, they start all over but the difficulty is increased. In total, there are 3 difficulty levels in this game.

The game features various tricks such as ollies, flip tricks, grinding, wheeling and grabs. There's also a Free Tour mode where players can choose any of the levels and the type of challenge they'd like to replay.

sample_screenshots.caption: You can make more than one flip at a time, just make sure you land it.
Part 2: Make points using one trick to impress the sponsor.
Before each level, you're given an instruction how to pull off tricks.

title: Skate & Slam

description:
Scarface: The Last Stand is a gallery shooter based on the final shootout starring Tony Montana from the 1983 movie Scarface. The game can be played either in a regular mode or in an endless survival mode, but with similar gameplay. Tony Montana is shown from a behind view in fixed, single screen location. The screen is divided into nine sectors that correspond with the number on the keypad, so pressing 9 will make him fire in the top right sector and 4 the left one in the middle. Different types of enemies appear and need to be taken out. Tony can quickly move from an opening position to cover. Cover prevents him from getting hits by bullets, but not grenades and rockets as these damage the cover and need to be shot out of the air. While in cover the gun's ammo is replenished and some health is restored. Moving from cover to the open firing position and vice versa is the only form of movement that is possible.

During gameplay power-ups sometimes appear. These need to be shot to activate them. There is armor that catches ten bullets without damage, a grenade that offers three rounds for a grenade launcher, rage for improved damage, unlimited ammo for a short period of time, a star for a score bonus, full health, and an explosive that damages everything on the screen. Damage to Tony is shown as bullet holes on the screen. When there are too many he dies. Enemies preferably need to be engaged when there is a blue bar above their heads as that means they are reloading. A score multiplier up to ten for successive kills can be gained.

sample_screenshots.caption: Bullet holes appear when you are hit.
Overview of some of the power-ups

title: Scarface: The Last Stand

description:
Call of Cthulhu: Darkness Within is an adventure game inspired by the writings of H. P. Lovecraft developed for mobile phones. The game takes place in Cairo in the 1930s. The protagonist is a student of a professor who gets a letter from his teacher asking him to come to Cairo ASAP as he has uncovered something extraordinary and fears that he is in danger. Balthazar Carter arrives only to find that his professor had gone insane and the expedition is put on hold. The new director is known to be interested in the occult and doesn't take kindly to Balthazar's curiosity. Being an expert in old Religions, players will need to help Balthazar uncover what happened to the professor, what was the find as well as the mysteries of an ancient religion which worships the god Cthulhu.

The game plays out as a point-and-click adventure, but instead of a mouse interface, players control the protagonist directly with him walking to the direction key players have pressed. Players are hinted when they're close to usable objects or people and can trigger a menu where they can choose what they want to do with the objects. Players can pick up and use items and during their adventures they will see a lot of cutscenes of what's going on in the city. Players switch to a top-down view when traveling through the city. The buildings players have access to are indicated with an icon.

sample_screenshots.caption: After getting rid of the police officer, we get a chance to talk to the medium.
Cutscene: A medium was caught snooping around the professor's room.
She sends us to get something from Ismail, but nothing's free in this world.
What should we find out more about?

title: Call of Cthulhu: Darkness Within - Book 1

description:
Johnny Bravo: Big Babe Adventure is a puzzle adventure game starring the infamous buff narcissist from the cartoon series. Johnny goes to the cinema hoping to find a girl for himself when he spots the girls being taken into a bus. After following the bus, Johnny finds a secret laboratory where the girls are being held captive. Getting inside the lavatory, as Johnny himself puts it, he sets out to rescue the kidnapped girls and, hopefully, find himself a date.

Players will have to help Johnny navigate through the laboratory, find and use objects to progress further, while avoiding machines, zombies and traps set by an Evil Scientist to stop Johnny. Getting to the next level is made possible by using teleporters available in each level. The cast of the cartoon make an appearance in the laboratory and Johnny may need to find and give them specific objects.

sample_screenshots.caption: Way to make an entrance, Johnny!
You know that I'm not here to give you presents, right?

title: Johnny Bravo: Big Babe Adventure

description:
Holy Wars: Sons of Enoch is an Action RPG for mobile phones based on a French comic book. Players take the role of Cain, a knight of a holy order delivering a message to the king of a neighboring kingdom in order to cleanse the land of pagans. On the way to the other kingdom, the knights are attacked by Golab mercenaries and after defeating their leader, find out that the Golabs were paid to kill the knights. Cain follows the trail to the bandit village to investigate who betrayed the holy knights and paid the mercenaries to kill them.

The game offers different kinds of swords and axes which can be upgraded to unlock additional moves. Upgrading the weapons to the next level requires players to have the corresponding amount of the weapon of the same kind. Two weapons are equipped by Cain and different combinations can boost his attack and defense. Travelling from area to area is done on a world map with random encounters which transfer Cain into a small map and have him battle the enemies in real time. Players can also fight in arenas and break barrels within a time limit to earn extra gold.

sample_screenshots.caption: Random encounters turn the screen black and show up as "Events"
Upgrading the weapon unlocks new combos.

title: Holy Wars: Sons of Enoch

description:
The mobile version of Crash of the Titans is a side scrolling beat 'em up which has players take control of Crash Bandicoot as he travels through the island defeating the creatures of his island that Neo Cortex has turned into monsters and stopping him yet again. To complete each level, Crash needs to get to the end of it and sometimes needs to push his enemies into totems which block his way forward.

This version allows players to select levels on a map made in a similar style to Super Mario Bros. 3. Crash has the ability to "Jack" his enemies, taking control of them for a limited time. While he's in control of the enemies, they attack automatically as long as there are enemies and objects right in front of them. Pressing the attack button will make Crash kick them away from him. Wumpa fruit, which is scattered across the levels acts as the in-game currency and allows Crash to upgrade his attacks.

sample_screenshots.caption: Completing a level awards us with a rank.
In the shop you can pay 50 wumpas to upgrade one of your skills.
Crash, this is no time to sleep!

title: Crash of the Titans

description:
Nowhere is a horror action game for mobile phones. The game takes place in two worlds where players control Lucas and John. Lucas has lost his wife Emily and is slowly getting his life together with Catherine, while John goes out to find his wife Emily while battling monsters.

While players are in control of Lucas, they can talk to NPCs and push boxes and when the game switches to John, players can equip weapons and tools to fight monsters and progress further through the game. The game adds an element of stealth as monsters can't see the protagonist when he's walking in darker areas and shooting alerts all the monsters nearby, causing them to attack the protagonist.

The game features two endings and depending on the chosen ending, a New Game Plus mode is unlocked which can either give the protagonist unlimited ammo or make the monsters much stronger.

sample_screenshots.caption: Wow, that's one hell of an earthquake!
Why do John and Sophia look like Lucas and Catherine?
Oh no, I'm bare handed so I'd best avoid this freak by walking in the shadows.
Someone found him unconscious and brought him to a cabin.

title: Nowhere

description:
Go to Hell is an action platformer for mobile phones. Players take control of Tom Carnacki, a self professed "Ghost Finder" and "Inquisitor". Growing tired of listening to the howls and scratching sounds outside, he leaves his house to investigate. After being led by a strange creature into a pit, Tom gets transferred into Hades. Armed with his trusty shotgun, Tom will need to venture through hell and defeat its ruler.

Tom has an unlimited amount of ammo and shooting some enemies will unleash souls which he must collect in order to teleport to the next area of a level. The aim of each level is to collect keys and when Tom gets the last key in the level, he is teleported to the area's boss which he has to defeat to go back to the level select area. Tom can upgrade his weapon provided he collects 3 satchels and gives them to an NPC in the level select area.

sample_screenshots.caption: Now Tom is invulnerable for a while and we must get to the portal to get to the next area.
We need 3 satchels to upgrade our shotgun's power.
The starting area. Outside of Tom's house.

title: Go to Hell

description: Pipe Mania is a remake of the original 1989 puzzle game for mobile phones. The game has a story mode with different locations as well as a classic mode based on the original game, a random mode and a puzzle mode with a limited set of pipes. The story consists of twenty levels where the player has to fix all of the city's leaks. To complete each level a network of pipes has to be constructed by placing pipes of different shapes next to each other. The pipe has to be of a certain length and be finished before the water starts to flow. Some of the later levels also have an end pipe that has to be reached.

sample_screenshots.caption: A bomb appears on the pipe

title: Pipe Mania

description:
Get Rich or Die Tryin' is a mobile rap star simulation game made to capitalize on the movie starring 50 Cent.

In this game, players create a rapper and go all the way from rags to riches. Players have 3 years to become the best rapper and they can do so by recording tracks that chart, as well as clubbing, shooting other rappers or cars that follow them around and by having rap battles with the fellow rappers. Each action advances the game for 1 week.

Players start with 2 genres and 2 topics that they can choose when writing a song and need to have inspiration in order to be able to record something. Unlocking additional genres is done by hanging out at one of the clubs and checking what the DJ plays. As for topics, their names hint how to unlock them. It's important to manage money in the game as getting to a negative balance and not covering it up with record sales will lead to a game over.

Talking to fellow rappers may lead to rap battles which help players earn extra money, as well as unlock new clubs and studios to record better quality tracks and players are given the choice to diss a rapper when recording a track which lowers their relationship with the chosen rapper. Players can also buy bling, which can raise the rapper's inspiration level, as well as allow him to score with one type of girls.

In case the players have a very bad relationship with a rapper, they may try to shoot them on contact and players will sometimes be followed by a car with a gunman in it. In these cases, players must shoot their enemies within a short time limit or they will be shot and waste in-game time in a hospital. Going crazy in clubs may also get the rapper imprisoned.

sample_screenshots.caption: Looks like G-Knuckles still hasn't forgiven me.
Recording a song. The more inspiration and fame you've got, the more likely it is to be a good song and chart.
Sometimes they can give you some insights.

title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'

description: Alonso Racing 2006 is the third game in the Formula One racing series based around the Spanish driver Fernando Alonso. Players race as him in three game modes: Training, Quick Race of Championship. Training is done without any opponents and in Championship a qualifying race is required to determine the starting position for the real race. The available tracks are Brazil, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Japan, Monaco, Spain and United Kingdom. While driving acceleration is done automatically, the player only need to brake and steer. Prior to some races and in the pits some car settings can be changed: the types of tyres, the gear ratio, and the aerodynamic load.
title: Alonso Racing 2006

description:
Dakar 2007 is a racing game based around the annual Dakar desert rally that was held between 6th and 21st January 2007 from Lisbon to Dakar. Players race fifteen stages in the Rally mode, covering Lisbon, Morocco, Western Sahara, Mauritania, Mali, Senegal and finally Dakar. Once a stage is completed it can also be accessed in the Time Trial mode.

Racing is done from a first-person perspective with many elements in the HUD such as the progress for the distance, the current time and the best time, speed and gear, remaining fuel, and damage to the engine and the wheels. The player has access to acceleration, braking, and steering the car left and right. By pressing lightly on the brake and then a directional arrow it is possible to skid. There are obstacles on the track that need to be dodged to prevent damage to the car. The track has pick-ups that replenish fuel or repair damage. Arrows provide guidance for turns. There are also jumps and sometimes the road branches into two paths: one dangerous and fast, the other easier and slower.

sample_screenshots.caption: A gentle turn to the left coming up.
Choose between the two roads ahead.
The red icons show my car is heavily damage, but I've just picked up additional fuel.

title: Dakar 2007

description:
Dakar Rally 08 is a racing game based around the annual Dakar desert rally that was meant to be held between 5th and 20th January 2008 from Lisbon to Senegal, but was cancelled one day before the start due to concerns over a possible terrorist attack aimed at the competitors. Compared to the previous game Dakar 2007 by the same developer the gameplay has become more arcade-like and there is a shift from a first-person perspective to a behind view now.

The Rally mode takes the place through the different stages. The HUD shows progress for the distance, current speed, current and best time, the condition of the car, the amount of boost and the number of collected flags. In addition to completing a stage without totalling the car, there are also ten blue flags to pick up as well as a souvenir piece. Based on the total performance a bronze, silver or gold medal is awarded. Controls consist of acceleration, braking and steering. Skidding through sharp corners is possible by braking slightly while turning at a high speed. Courses have obstacles and cracks in the road that need to be avoided. There are many pick-ups: manual boosts, a shield for a brief invincibility, a power-up that makes the car bounce like a frog several times, full repair, and a manual jump. Arrows with different colours warn for upcoming turns and their curve or large gaps.

Next to the main Rally mode there is Quick Race and Flag Chase. In Flag Races the course is littered with flags and they all have to be collected before time runs out. Stages can only be played in the Quick Race mode when they are completed in the Rally mode. Trophies are stored in a separate Trophy Room. There are four cars to choose from.
title: Dakar Rally 08

description: Dakar 2005 is a racing game based around the annual Dakar desert rally that was held between 31st December 2004 and 16th January 2015 from Barcelona to Dakar. Players get to race twelve stages, either in the Rally mode or in the Time Trial mode once a stage has been completed in the first. The car is driven using a behind view. The player is able to accelerate and shift gears, brake and steer. The HUD shows the progress for the distance, the damage the engine has sustained and the remaining fuel. While driving an icons appears when a hazard is coming up. These obstacles need to be avoided to prevent damage. Every now and then spanner icons appears on the course and those can be picked up to repair the vehicle. When a checkpoint is passed the car is refuelled.

sample_screenshots.caption: Skidding through a corner while picking up a spanner to repair the engine.
A warning appears for an obstacle coming up.

title: Dakar 2005

description:
Dakar 2006 is a racing game based around the annual Dakar desert rally that was held between 31st December 2005 and 15th January 2016 from Lisbon to Dakar. Using a 2D top-down and vertically scrolling perspective players get to experience the rally either in the Dakar Raid mode that links all stages together and time and progression are saved, or individually in the Stage Trial mode. Some versions of the game on smaller screens do not have the second game mode.

The player controls the car's acceleration, braking and steering. The car needs to avoid obstacles to prevent damage. The condition of the car is shown through a wrench bar and damage affects the car's performance. There is also a fuel meter. Every type of surface has a different traction that affects speed, so the player needs to choose the optimal route for the most efficient fuel consumption. Every now and then red icons appear as locations where fuel can be refilled, but time keeps running. The game keeps track of the overall standing compared to the (invisible) opponents.

sample_screenshots.caption: Keep on the grey path for the highest speed.
Start of the first stage in Portugal

title: Dakar 2006

description: Dakar Rally 2009 is a 3D racing game based around the annual Dakar desert rally that started on 3rd January 2009 and was held for the first time in South America, in Argentina and Chile. The stages can be explored in three game modes: Quick Rally, Time Attack and Championship. Quick Rally consists of randomly selected tracks once they are unlocked by completing them in the Championship mode. In the main Championship mode the player races alone and the time is compared against the other (invisible) racers for the overall progress. In the Quick Rally mode a race consists of several laps against opponents that are also on the track and can be crashed into. The focus is on driving, there are no power-ups or arcade elements.
title: Dakar Rally 2009

description: Dakar Rally 2010 is a 3D racing game based around the annual Dakar desert rally that was held between 1st and 16th January 2010 in Argentina and Chile. The game is similar in design and features to the previous title Dakar Rally 2009. The stages can be explored in three game modes: Quick Rally, Time Attack and Championship. Quick Rally consists of randomly selected tracks once they are unlocked by completing them in the Championship mode. In Time Attack the player gets to race a ghost car to compete against the best personal times. In the main Championship mode the player races alone and the time is compared against the other (invisible) racers for the overall progress. In the Quick Rally mode a race consists of several laps against opponents that are also on the track and can be crashed into. The focus is on driving, there are no power-ups or arcade elements.

sample_screenshots.caption: Countdown before the start of the race
Stage selection in the Quick Rally mode

title: Dakar Rally 2010

description:
Ferrero vs Moya Tennis is a tennis game marketed around the Spanish players Juan Carlos Ferrero Donat and Carlos Moyà Llompart. One of the two players is chosen as the character and three game modes are available: Exhibition, Tournament and Championship. The tournament is played Australia, France, UK or USA. There are options for the number of games (two or six), the amount of sets (one, three or five) and the difficulty level (easy, medium or hard).

Movement is done using four keys. Generally only a single button is used to hit the ball, but with different options. By pressing Up or Down before hitting the ball, a lob or a drop shot is performed respectively. Precision and power increase the earlier the effect is applied before taking the shot. The shot direction can be determined through three separate buttons (left, centre, right). The direction keys for left and right can be used in the same way to add effect and determine the direction. By pressing the button twice an automatic lob or drop shot is performed. For the service a gauge is filled slowly and the player determines when to execute it. Doing it too soon results in a weak serve and waiting too long leads to a fault as the ball goes out.

sample_screenshots.caption: The bar shows my player charging a serve.

title: Ferrero vs Moya Tennis

description: Pau Gasol: One on One is a one-on-one basketball game marketed around the Spanish player Pau Gasol Sáez. The game offers three game modes: Practice (practice shots and matches), One on One (a quick game against any of the eight included players) and Tournament (a series of matches against all players). The game offers options for character customization through jersey colour, skin colour, hair and characteristics such as technique, speed and accuracy. Moves include defending, blocking, dribbling, shooting and dunking.
title: Pau Gasol: One on One

description: Sudoku Mania is a mobile game offering a selection of more than 5000 Sudoku puzzles with three difficulty levels. There are two game modes. In the Normal mode you determine the difficulty level and the size of the grid. There is no time pressure. In the Challenge mode there are 25 fixed levels with an increasing difficulty and a time limit.
title: Sudoku Mania

description: Nani Roma: 4x4 Raid is a racing game marketed around the Spanish rally racing driver Joan "Nani" Roma Cararach, best known for winning the Dakar rally both on a motorcycle and in a car. The game offers two game modes based on a car rally: Raid and Time Trial. Time Trial provide single races against the clock for the best times. In Raid a rally with six stages needs to be completed with different environments such as the desert or savanna. Racing is done from a first-person perspective. The HUD shows the current time, the best time, progress for the distance, current gear, speed, car damage and remaining fuel. There are obstacles on the road and these need to be avoided so as not to sustain damage that affects the car's performance. Additional fuel and a full repair can be picked up while driving.
title: Nani Roma: 4x4 Raid

description:
The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader is an action game that was released alongside the movie of the same name.

The game starts with Edmund, Lucy and Eustace being sucked in a painting of a ship. While on the other side they find themselves on the ship the Dawn Treader witch is under attack by pirates at that moment. Caspian rescues the trio from an attacking pirate giant and explains the situation. The player now takes control of one of the heroes and switches between Edmund, Lucy and Caspian. Lone islands and other locations from the movie are visited like the island where Eustace is transformed into a dragon.

Gameplay includes defeating enemies including bosses with a sword as well as solving simple puzzles. In some parts the player will control a rowboat and has to evade rocks and attacking pirates on a rowboat. Health and stamina can be replenished along the way by picking up bottles dropped by defeating enemies or destroying jars or opening treasure chests.

sample_screenshots.caption: Distracting this guy until Caspian opens the door

title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

description:
Roland Garros is a tennis game based around the yearly gravel tennis tournament in France. The game offers three game modes: Practice, Exhibition and Roland Garros. The mechanics are a continuation of the developer's earlier title Ferrero vs Moya Tennis.

The player can be freely moved around the court. Shots are done using three keys for different directions: left, centre and right. When a shot button is pressed twice, an automatic dropshot or lob is performed. Before hitting the ball up, down, left or right can already be pressed to change the shot direction. Serving is done using a charge meter. A yellow marker shows where the ball is going to land. Game options include the amount of games and set, and changing the difficulty level.

sample_screenshots.caption: A forehand close behind the net

title: Roland Garros

description:
Roland Garros 2007 is a tennis game based around the yearly gravel tennis tournament in France. It is a follow-up to the developer's Roland Garros from the year before. The game modes are Practice, Exhibition and Roland Garros.

Gameplay is fairly identical to the previous game, but this version has slightly faster exchanges and there is a small amount of scrolling compared to the fixed screen of the previous game. Some versions of the game have support for local versus multiplayer matches against another player through Bluetooth. New to the series is that female competitors are now included as well. Players are unlicensed, but name and appearance closely match the real ones. Players also have different characteristics now, based on the parameters accuracy, speed and strength.

The player can be freely moved around the court. Shots are done using three keys for different directions: left, centre and right. When a shot button is pressed twice, an automatic dropshot or lob is performed. Before hitting the ball up, down, left or right can already be pressed to change the shot direction. A yellow marker shows where the ball is going to land. Serving is done using a charge meter.

sample_screenshots.caption: There are now tournaments for both genders (Nokia N80 version).
A foul returning the ball (Nokia S40 version).

title: Roland Garros 2007

description:
Pedrosa GP 2007 is a Grand Prix motorcycle racing game marketed around the Spanish rider Daniel Pedrosa Ramal. Game modes are Practice, Race, Championship and Duel. Duel is a local versus multiplayer race against a human opponent using Bluetooth. Races are shown using a 2D side-scrolling bird's-eye perspective. In the Championship mode different GPs are done playing as Daniel Pedrosa.

Acceleration is done automatically, the player only does the steering and braking. A combination of both can be used for sharp turns. Every GP starts with a qualifying round with a single lap racing alone to determine the starting grid for the real race with opponents. While racing arrows warn for upcoming turns. Breaking a circuit's lap record unlocks it for single races. There is no damage model.

sample_screenshots.caption: Starting grid for the real race
The arrows shows the type of turn coming up.

title: Pedrosa GP 2007

description:
Rival Wheels is a motorbike racing game. It is the 2D version of the smartphone game with the same name which it differs from in the use of an isometric birds' view perspective and gameplay that is most similar to an endless running game. Races take place on three-lane streets where the player moves left and right in an attempt to reach the finishing line without hitting cars, trucks and other obstacles. In addition to the runner races, there are also pursuit races where the player has to catch up with an opponent and duel races where bosses have to be defeated by gear changing on time similar to the smartphone game.

The game has three locations (Tokyo, Havana and New York) each with ten races. Each race has three objectives with the player earning wheels for each. Wheels are needed to unlock the next location. During races, coins can be collected and afterward used to unlock special skills. Each bike has one special skill. All bikes are licensed from manufacturers such as Suzuki and Ducati and are unlocked by winning races.
title: Rival Wheels

description: In MySims the player lives in a town that has become ruined after a violent storm. It is their job to rebuild the town in order to attract tourists. This is achieved by collecting six special gems and playing mini-games such as fishing, racquet ball, making lei and sushi, paragliding and skydiving. There are many customization options for the Sim. The game can be played in a main story mode but the mini-games can also be accessed right away.

sample_screenshots.caption: Your character arrives in town by boat.

title: MySims

description:
The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian is a role-playing game for mobile phone that was released alongside the movie of the same name.

The game starts with Prince Caspian being summoned to the garden by his uncle were he receives combat training. At some point Caspian is warned by Doctor Cornelius that his uncle wants to take the throne from him after his aunt has given birth to a son. Putting his life in danger and he now has to flee the castle into the woods. He receives the a magical horn (which turns out to be the horn of Susan) only to be used when the situation seems hopeless. Caspian now has to find a way to reclaim the throne with the help of the old Narnians and the Pevensie children.

In the game the player has to solve simple quests like gathering certain items or free trapped Narnians. Along the way enemies like Telmarine soldiers and werewolves have to be defeated. When engaging an enemy the game enters a battle mode in which the player can attack or defend the opponent with his sword. Defeating enemies yields exp that can be used to level up skills like attack, defense and spirit. As the story progresses the player will gather sidekicks that help him in battle. Sidekicks are activated when the purple bar below the health bar is full. The player need to press a sequence of arrow commands to let the sidekick attack Along the way food can be found in trees, in chests or by completing a quest to replenish health.

A second story line where the player gets to play from the perspective of Peter and a Arena mode can be unlocked after beating the game.
title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian

description:
Sumo Smash! is a party game for up to three players with sumo wrestlers challenging each other on a platform. The game is played on a fixed-screen showing a platform with the sumo wrestlers using a top-down view. The wrestlers cannot be controlled directly. They constantly rotate in a stationary position at a fixed speed. By pressing and holding down a button the player makes the wrestler go forward in the direction he is facing for as long as the button is pressed. As soon as the button is released the wrestler starts rotating again. The game can be played in different game modes: Challenge (collect sushi playing along against a time limit), Tag (a game of tag) and Fight (bump other wrestlers off the platform). As only a single button or key press is used up to three players can participate simultaneously in local multiplayer using the same device. When playing alone the computer controls the opponents.

The game is almost identical to Jumbo Rumble by the same developer released in the same year. Sumo Smash! only replaces the elephants with sumo wrestlers.

sample_screenshots.caption: Choose up to three players for the Fight mode
One of the wrestlers has been bumped off.
Three pieces of sushi collected so far
A game of Tag in progress. The countdown is started for the red player.

title: Sumo Smash!

description:
Jumbo Rumble is a game about elephants challenging each other on a platform. The game is played on a fixed-screen showing a platform with the elephants using a top-down view. The elephants cannot be controlled directly. They constantly rotate in a stationary position at a fixed speed. By pressing and holding down a button the player makes the elephant go forward in the direction it is facing for as long as the button is pressed. As soon as the button is released the elephant starts rotating again.

The game can be played in different game modes: Challenge (collect melons playing along against a time limit), Tag (a game of tag) and Fight (bump other elephants off the platform). There can be up to three elephants on the platform in the Fight and the Tag mode and the two other ones are controlled by the computer. Some versions of the game offer multiplayer, turning it into a party title with three players simultaneously. As only a single button or key press is used up to three players can participate simultaneously in local multiplayer using the same device.

sample_screenshots.caption: Starting a game in the Challenge mode.
Bumping other elephants in the Fight mode.

title: Jumbo Rumble

description:
Prince of Persia: Warrior Within is a 2D action platform game for mobile phone based on the better known 3D action platform game of the same name. The Empress of Time is hunting the Prince after he changed his destiny using the Sands of Time.

Gameplay incudes platforming and defeating enemies with a sword. Sometimes chains have to be swung to reach certain places. Aside from the enemies, the Prince also has to evade lethal traps. Potions for restoring health can be found along the way. The game offers an adventure (story) mode and Arena mode.

sample_screenshots.caption: I need to find this portal

title: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

description:
Crash Bandicoot: Mutant Island is an 2D action platform game for mobile phones based on the better known 3D action platform game. The game starts with Crash's sister Coco being kidnaped by Cortex. Crash hurries to save his sister and confronts cortex and his giant robot. In the battle that follows, Coco manages to escape but upon return they realise it was all a distraction to kidnap and hypnotize the other Bandicoots.

Gameplay includes platforming and defeating enemies. Crash can jump, sprint and beat-up enemies. Enemies include various monsters and animals such as rock throwing apes. Crash also needs to tame giant titans in order to reach places that can only be reached with a titan's abilities.

sample_screenshots.caption: To beat him you must tickle him

title: Crash Bandicoot: Mutant Island

description:
Beowulf: The Mobile Game is a fantasy themed 2D action platform game for mobile phone based on the 2007 movie based itself on an old English epic poem. In the game the player assumes the role of the mighty warrior Beowulf who is said to possess the strength of thirty men.

Gameplay incudes platforming and defeating enemies with a sword. Enemies include monster, skeletons and several bosses like a sea serpents, Grendel and his mother. Along the way gems can be collected as well as food to restore health and jewels to increase health. Beowulf can use over fifteen special moves including a move called Carnal Fury that can kill several enemies at once. There is also a move that lets you rip an enemy in half.
title: Beowulf: The Mobile Game

description:
The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor is an 2D action platform game for mobile phone based on the 2008 movie of the same name. In ancient times China was ruled by a ruthless and powerful emperor that commanded an army that was feared throughout the ancient world. Now two thousand year later in 1946 Alex O'Connell leads an expedition into China to find the tome of this Dragon emperor.

Gameplay incudes platforming and defeating enemies with a gun, grenades or bare hands. Enemies include regular human soldiers and terracotta soldiers. Along the way gems can be collected as well as medpacks to restore health. Sometimes simple puzzles have to be solved to advance. There is also a level where the player has to steer a car.
title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor

description:
Predators is a 2D action platform game for mobile phone based on the 2010 movie of the same name. In the game the player assumes the role of the mercenary Royce who blacked out during a firefight while working in the Congo for a coltan mining operations. After regaining consciousness he finds himself on an alien world.

Gameplay incudes platforming and defeating enemies with a gun, a flamethrower or a limit amount of bombs. Enemies range from various strange creatures and flesh eating plants to predators. Along the way skulls can be collected as well as bottles with a green liquid to restore health. There is also a level played from a front view in which the player has to stay ahead of a predator that is trying to kill him.
title: Predators

description:
Captain Blood is a sword fighting game inspired by Rafael Sabatini's Captain Blood adventure novels. The main gameplay consists of fighting one-on-one battles where the key to victory is slashing, slicing or stabbing the opponent at the right time while blocking their attacks.

There are two game modes available: campaign mode, which is the story mode and features two campaigns, one with captain Peter Blood, the other with Velina. In this mode, in between the battles, players will be offered a world map to travel to various towns, where they must defeat two enemies and one governor to take control of the town and spend their hard earned gold received during battles.

The gold can be spent on regaining and raising Peter Blood or Velina's HP, as well as expanding their ship to have even more HP. It can also be spent on improving the strength of their weapons.

The second mode is a duel mode where players can hone their swordsmanship without any dialogue.

sample_screenshots.caption: Afterwards, we get points depending on how well we did.
The second campaign is unlocked after completing the first one.
Combat. The game shows when the protagonists get a combo.

title: Captain Blood

description: Star Wars: Battle Above Coruscant is a vertically-scrolling shoot'em up for mobile phones based on the opening scenes of the film Revenge of the Sith. The player controls the starfighter of Anakin Skywalker who must make his way to General Grievous' ship through six levels, destroying enemy fighters and missiles, attacking gun emplacements of enemy capital ships and defending Obi-Wan's ship from buzz droids. The latter is done by activating R2-D2's power charge. Destroyed enemies leave behind power-ups that refill the ship's or R2's energy, upgrade the weapons or activate a shield.
title: Star Wars: Battle Above Coruscant

description:
Dungeon Hunter: Curse of Heaven is the feature phone version of the smartphone game with the same name. It's an action RPG like previous games in the series but has 2D graphics that mixes a bird's view perspective with characters that are drawn from a side view. The game takes place on five islands (each with three stages) that have appeared in the ocean after a mysterious earthquake. The strange islands are full of demon forces and the player is a bounty hunter that travels there to keep the menace at bay.

Similar to other action RPGs, the game involves fighting large numbers of enemies while collecting new equipment and leveling up. The player can equip two weapons at a time that can be switched during game time. Additionally, there is a bracer that can be used for a magic attack and a shield that can be activated for protection during combat. Weapons include greatswords and dual blades as well as ranged weapons such as staffs and crossbows. The game has some quick-time events where the player quickly has to press a button.

New equipment is given after completing a level. All items and enemies can be one of five elements (water, fire, nature, death, light) with each element having a bonus against another element. Items can be upgraded by combing them with other items. When an item reaches its maximum level it can be evolved to a higher tier. Items that has reached its maximum tier can be fused with items of the same type and of the same tier.
title: Dungeon Hunter: Curse of Heaven

description: Tetris Midlet is an unofficial Tetris clone. The basic gameplay is identical. Geometric shapes fall from the top of a playfield to rest on the bottom; fit the pieces together, and the line they form disappears. If the pieces don't form lines and eventually stack up to the top of the playfield, the game is over.

sample_screenshots.caption: You can select the difficulty by pressing a specific button on your phone

title: Tetris Midlet

description: Fremtris is an unofficial Tetris game. Geometric shapes fall from the top of the playfield to rest on the bottom; fit the pieces together, and the line they form disappears. If the pieces don't form lines and eventually stack up to the top of the playfield, the game is over.
title: Fremtris

description:
Livingstone: Lost Again is a platformer based upon the 1980s games. The player is controlling Henry Stanley, once again trying to locate the famous Doctor Livingstone in the depths of Africa.

The player will have to navigate through each level, negotiating treacherous pits and traps, and avoiding enemies such as snakes, birds or inhospitable natives.

The game is keypad controlled; there's a wide range of movements beside just running and jumping: Henry Stanley can crawl, climb, grab edges, and attack enemies with his whip.
title: Livingstone: Lost Again

description:
Oil Rig is a platform game where the player takes on the role of an oil rig manager. The objective of the game is to protect the oil rig from slimy monsters and pirates by collecting three wrenches and fixing a leaking pipe on each level.

The hero is controlled with the menu keys. The monsters and pirates can be stunned by pressing the left soft key.
title: Oil Rig

description:
Fast & Furious 6 is a mobile racing game based on the 2013 movie with the same name. It's the second Fast & Furious games from Gameloft after Fast Five the Movie: Official Game. The game plays mostly the same as its precursor and features street racing from various locations around the world. New features include the super boost which is borrowed from Asphalt 6: Adrenaline and helicopters that fire rockets at the player's car.

The game's main mode is the story which follows the same structure as the one in Fast Five. It's made up of seven chapters each with five races which have to be completed to progress to the next chapter. As progress is made new cars, parts and characters are unlocked. Most race modes are the same as in the previous game and include normal races as well as events that involve drifting or taking out the opposing drivers. New modes include Collector which involves grabbing enough money and Wanted where the player has to avoid getting busted by the police.
title: Fast & Furious 6

description: Fast & Furious is a mobile racing game based on the movie with the same name. It was released alongside a 3D version and retains the behind view of that version but uses 2D graphics with a more basic scenery. Like its 3D counterpart, it is built around nine sequences from the movie, but this version features less content and each scene only contains a mission but none of the additional race modes.
title: Fast & Furious

description:
Deal or No Deal is a mobile adaptation of the TV game show with the same name. The original version of the game was based on the UK version of the show but it was later localized and adapted to the shows of other nations. Each version has its own graphics but has the same gameplay and features except for some minor variations.

The gameplay is the same as in the TV show. The player has to choose from 22 identical boxes and pick the one with the highest value. Each box has a value between 1p and £250,000. Thereafter the player starts opening the boxes to reveal the content of each. After every round, the player gets an offer from the banker and the player has to decide to take the deal or carry on playing. This will then go on until there are only two boxes left and the banker gives his final offer. If the player still rejects the offer, the banker may offer to swap the remaining box with the one in possession of the player.

There are two game modes: instant play and challenge mode. Instant play is a single game while involves playing through a full season twenty episodes. For each episode, the player has to qualify by earning enough money in the previous one. Additionally, it's necessary to answer at least one quiz question correctly to advance to the main game.
title: Deal or No Deal

description: À prendre ou à laisser: 2nde édition is the second mobile game based on the TV game show À prendre ou à laisser, the French version of Deal or No Deal. Unlike the first game, which was an adaptation of an English title, this game was exclusively released in France.
