The game's main mode works much the same as in the original and consists of twenty episodes where the player has to make a certain amount of money in each to unlock the next one. The money earned can now be spent in a shop on things like shoes, clocks and jewelry. There is a new game mode where the player becomes the banker and makes offers to an AI-controlled contestant.
title: À prendre ou à laisser: 2nde édition

description: New Deal or No Deal is the second mobile game based on the UK version of the game show Deal or No Deal. The main difference from the previous game is that the player starts out on the Contestant's Row which means he has to wait for his turn while watching other contestants first playing the game. At times, the contestants will ask the player for advice. Once the proper game has started it works like before with the player choosing to open boxes to reveal their contents while deciding whether to accept the banker's offer. If unsure it's possible to ask another contestant for advice. In addition to the main mode, there's a quick play mode that skips the contestant's row, a banker's mode where the player makes the offers and a shortened mode called What would you do now? which lasts for a maximum of four rounds.
title: New Deal or No Deal

description:
WRC: FIA World Rally Championship Mobile is an officially licensed mobile racing game. This version of the game is in 2D and therefore differs a bit from the 3D version. Most of the content is the same but it only has a third-person perspective and the graphics are sprite-based and less detailed. Controlling the cars works the same though with the player steering and braking while the acceleration is automatic.

The game has two game modes: championship and arcade. The championship mode simulates a full season and the player is given points in each race depending on the position. Bonus points are awarded when passing through special crowd pleaser events. Earn enough points and extra car bonuses are unlocked. The arcade mode is played against five other cars and in each race the player has to finish high enough to advance to the next rally course.
title: WRC: FIA World Rally Championship Mobile

description:
Clash of the Titans: The Movie is an action game for mobile phones set in a fictional ancient Greece and based on the 2010 movie of the same name. It are dire times as man have rebelled against the rule of the gods. The gods now plan to exterminate mankind in return and the only one to save mankind from this terrible fate is the demigod Perseus.

In the game the player takes control of Perseus and has to beat up various animals, skeletons and mythological creatures. Perseus is armed with his sword and shield. Enemies yield exp that can be used to upgrade Perseus skills like sword mastery. Items like potions to recover health can be found along the way. Several bosses have to be fought like Calibos and Medusa.
title: Clash of the Titans: The Movie

description:
The Wolfman is an action platform game based on the 2010 movie of the same name. Lawrence Talbot returns home to investigate the mysterious and violent death of his brother Ben reuniting with his father he has not seen in a long time.

In the game the player takes control of Lawrence and has to navigate through the levels, evade traps and beat up enemies. Along the way health can be replenished by destroying jars containing boltless. The player will not only plays as Lawrence as a human but later on also as a werewolf.
title: The Wolfman

description:
Jurassic Park is an action game based on the 1993 movie of the same name. Ian Malcolm and Alan Grant are present at a protest against illegal poaching and genetic manipulation of dinosaurs off the coast off Isla Nublar when their ships capsizes and they are stranded on the island.

In the game the player takes control of Ian Malcolm and Alan Grant. The player has to moves across the island and needs to defend himself from attacks of poachers and dinosaurs. Along the way items like guns, ammo and med packs can be picked up. In one level the players steers a car and has to stay ahead of an angry T-Rex. There is also a level in which the player controls the T-Rex mother who has to pursue a trailer with her stolen egg.
title: Jurassic Park

description:
Gothic 3: The Beginning is a role-playing game set 140 years prior to the first game in the series. The player takes control of Xardas, who is visited by a ghost named Buthomar. Buthomar tells Xardas to find the four chosen ones and restore the sealed magic to the island of Khorinis.

Aside from the main quest, the player can take on side quests and use magic or melee combat to defeat enemies like hostile wildlife, orcs and trolls. While moving from one place to another on the maps, the player encounters enemies they can choose to fight or ignore. As the player levels Xardas up, more powerful spells and weapons become available.

sample_screenshots.caption: A guard not allowing me in the temple at the capital

title: Gothic 3: The Beginning

description:
Ryan Giggs International is a football game named after the Manchester United player and Wales international Ryan Giggs. The game is played from a bird's eye view that scrolls from side to side. Controls are simple with tapping a directional key for a pass and holding it for running with the ball. When in a goal-scoring position an indicator turns blue and tapping any key then will lead to a goal. Defending is limited to changing the player in control while tackling is automatic.

The game features two modes of play: friendlies and tournaments. Friendlies are single games while the tournament is a simple cup competition where the player has to advance through the rounds. In both modes, the player can choose from international teams and they can be played at either amateur or professional difficulty level. All players except for Ryan Giggs are unnamed.

sample_screenshots.caption: The indicator turns blue when in a goal-scoring position

title: Ryan Giggs International

description: Ratatouille: Cheese Rush is the second of two mobile games based on the animated movie Ratatouille. Whereas the first one was a time management game, Cheese Rush is a racing game. The player steers Remy the rat from a top-down perspective and has to follow a scent trail of cheese to find a big cheese wheel. Remy runs forward automatically and gameplay mostly involves steering left and right to follow the trail. A level is completed upon reaching the cheese wheel. Various obstacles have to be avoided such as dirty water, ketchup, syrup and air vents.
title: Disney•Pixar Ratatouille: Cheese Rush

description:
Shadowalker is a side-scrolling action game for mobile phones. Players take control of Phoenix Shadowalker, a mysterious female bounty hunter that earns bounty by protecting the villagers from the evil spirits at sea. Strange ghostly creatures have been appearing during the night and kidnapping children from the villages. The frightened villagers have turned to Shadowalker, whom they've turned their backs on, to stop them and she follows the ghosts to investigate the reasons for the kidnappings!

The protagonist can use her sword and the gun she picks up to fight enemies and will automatically switch to shooting when an enemy is far from her, however, Shadowalker can't shoot while jumping. Throughout the game, Shadowalker will also unlock additional skills such as double jumping. Money earned in levels can be spent in stores on better weapons and armor, which can also be found inside chests in some of the levels. All the unlocked levels and stores are shown on a world map, however, they can not be replayed.

sample_screenshots.caption: Looks like Shadowalker uses a wing to double jump.
Luckily, Phoenix is no silent protagonist.
Sometimes, Shadowalker can find new gear in chests.

title: Shadowalker

description:
Blood+ is an hack and slash platform game based on the anime series Blood+ created by Production I.G. The game is set in the fictional town of Shiki-Newtown, which has recently been terrorized by attacks from monstrous bat-like creatures called Chiropterans. Players control the anime's main protagonist Saya Otonashi, a high-school girl who is capable of killing the Chiropterans and their ultimate goal is to find and kill Diva, Saya's younger twin sister.

Saya wields a sword and unlocks new combos as players progress through the game. When Saya's enemies are close to death, a Down Arrow sign appears above their head and pressing the corresponding key will initiate a sequence of keys players must press for Saya to effectively dismember the enemy. Defeated enemies drop crystals which charge Saya's Bloodlust meter and using the finishing moves mentioned above will help fill the meter faster. Once the meter is full and players activate Saya's Bloodlust, enemies start taking more damage, with most enemies taking one hit to be stunned, and another hit to be killed. Players may also find healing items and lore items that tell them about Saya's past in trunks scattered all across the levels.

Besides the Story Mode, players may also fight in an Arena, where Saya must defeat as many enemies as possible without dying. As players defeat enough enemies, the areas of the upper levels of the Arena will open.

sample_screenshots.caption: Saya can use her finishing moves on bosses as well.
The Story is told through scrolling text and dialogues.
Activating Bloodlust, we see a picture of Saya and are shown how she unsheathes her sword.

title: Blood+

description: Crash Twinsanity is a mobile game based on the console game of the same name. The game shares the same story of the console version, with Crash and Dr Neo Cortex teaming up to save the world from the Evil Twins. The gameplay is centred around the sections of the original game where Crash has to protect Cortex from hazards by jumping on switches before Cortex collides with the hazard. The game includes 6 levels.
title: Crash Twinsanity

description: Crash Twinsanity 3D, not to be confused with another mobile Crash game, Crash Twinsanity, features traditional Crash gameplay as players run through levels collecting Wumpa fruit, breaking crates and dodging bottomless pits in order to save the world from the Evil Twins. Levels can be played as standard or in time-trial mode, where they are timed and given a rank depending on how quickly they completed the level. Unlike the console game and previous mobile game, Crash does not team up with Cortex in this game.
title: Crash Twinsanity 3D

description: Crash Racing is a mobile racing game based off of the console game Crash Tag Team Racing.
title: Crash Racing

description:
Crash Nitro Kart 2, not to be confused with Crash Bandicoot Nitro Kart 2 is a sequel to the mobile version of Crash Nitro Kart. Crash, Cortex, Coco, Ripper Roo, Yaya, Nina, Tiny Tiger and Oxide are all playable characters. The game features multiple tracks and allows players to collect C, R, A, S, H letters whilst driving; collecting all of them unlocks a speed boost.

The game features the following game modes:

  • Quick Race, consisting of a single race with random settings.
  • Cup, consisting of 4 races.
  • Challenge, a mission-based mode that allows the player to unlock new characters.
  • Arcade, consisting of a single race on a chosen track.
  • Sudden Death, where players must race through every track in the game and have to restart if they don't get first or second place.
  • Monster Truck, where the player has to destroy as many enemies as possible in a monster truck.
title: Crash Nitro Kart 2

description: Based loosely on the DS game of the same name, Crash Boom Bang! is a simple mini-game compilation featuring 14 mini-games that can be played using only the thumb. Single-player modes include a mode where the player plays individual mini-games or plays mini-games in a row to accumulate a high score. The game includes a "free for all" local multiplayer mode, in which all players use their thumbs on the same handset to control their character.
title: Crash Boom Bang!

description:
Spyro the Dragon for mobile devices is a game similar to the Nintendo DS game Spyro: Shadow Legacy. Spyro has to save the dragons, who have been captured by an evil sorcerer, from an alternate dimension called the Shadow Realm.

Gameplay revolves around Spyro swapping between the "normal" versions of worlds and their Shadow Realm counterparts to overcome obstacles. Spyro has 3 different attacks: one for attacking in the normal world, one for attacking in the Shadow Realm and one that applies to both realms and is used to smash breakable objects. These attacks can be levelled up by collecting different coloured gems - each colour levels up a different move.

sample_screenshots.caption: A key to open a door

title: Spyro the Dragon

description:
The Simpsons: Itchy & Scratchy Land takes place inside the Itchy & Scratchy Land Theme Park. The aim of the game is to save the park from robots. The main playable character is Homer, but Marge, Bart, and Lisa are playable characters in some missions. The player obtains points from hitting combos, killing enemies and rescuing citizens. Depending on how many points the player obtains they receive a bronze, silver or gold medal. The game includes 3 levels:

  • Explosion Land
  • Unnecessary Surgery Land
  • Torture Land
title: The Simpsons: Itchy & Scratchy Land

description: Sonic Racing Kart is a mobile kart racing game. Sonic accelerates automatically, with the player controlling when he turns left and right. The game has online capabilities, with players being able to race time attacks of other players or upload their own.
title: Sonic Racing Kart

description: Sonic Kart 3D X is a sequel to Sonic Racing Kart. The game brings improved 3D graphics and network capabilities, with Grand Prix mode being online for competitive gameplay in addition to Time Attack mode.
title: Sonic Kart 3D X

description: RatZ is a mobile game created for the Siemens SL45i phone. Set in small single-screen mazes, the player controls a rat and needs to run away from the cat chasing it while collecting cheese energy to keep going. All pieces need to be collected to complete a level. The rat starts with three lives. The game keeps track of the score and the high score.
title: RatZ

description: Super Jewel Quest is a mobile entry in the Jewel Quest match-three puzzle game series. It plays similarly to other puzzle games of its kind. Matches are created by creating groups of three or more jewels of the same kind. Making matches of four or five jewels destroy additional jewels of the same color. There are two kinds of levels: regular ones where the whole board has to be turned into gold and boss levels which are played against an AI opponent. Boss levels are turn-based and involve being the first to collect a certain amount of jewels or to turn 70 percent of the board into gold. There are power-ups that are made available by matching coins. The first one is a hammer that can be used to remove a single jewel from the board.
title: Super Jewel Quest

description: Sonic Cricket is a simple cricket game starring Sonic the Hedgehog. Players take control of Sonic and his friends as they form a team to take on Dr. Eggman and his robots.

sample_screenshots.caption: Oh look, a Metal gear NES reference
Tails prepares to hit the ball

title: Sonic Cricket

description:
FIFA Football 2004: Mobile International Edition is the second mobile FIFA game from developer Distinctive Developments. The gameplay is largely identical to the 2003 edition and uses the same controls. Graphically the game has been given an update with more detailed player sprites but an overhead view of the pitch is still used.

The game has the following game modes:

  • Training
  • Penalty Shootout
  • Friendly
  • Tour
title: FIFA Football 2004: Mobile International Edition

description: FIFA 07 3D is the second mobile version of FIFA 07. It has the same content and gameplay as the 2D version but instead of the isometric graphics it uses a 3D game engine which allows for different viewpoints and zoom levels.
title: FIFA 07 3D

description:
FIFA 08 is the mobile version of the annual football game series. It retains the isometric viewpoints of FIFA 07 but adds some new gameplay features such as improved movement, a sprint key and text commentary from Andy Gray. It is also the first mobile game to use the database of player attributes from the console version. Another new feature is in-form players who are randomly selected ahead of each match and get heightened abilities.

Game modes include training and friendlies, an enhanced seasons mode, a new club challenge mode which consists of a series of scenarios that culminates in a title-deciding match. The game includes club teams from Premier League, Ligue 1, Bundesliga, La Liga and Serie A as well as national teams.
title: FIFA 08

description: FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006 is the official mobile game of the tournament. The game is an adaptation of FIFA 06 and features largely identical gameplay but with some improvements in terms of goalkeeper AI and ball dynamics as well as dry and wet weather effects that affect the speed of the ball and the accuracy of passes and shots. The main difference is that it allows the player to play through the full World Cup competition with any of the 32 competing national teams. It replaces the cup and scenario game modes of FIFA 06.
title: FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006

description:
FIFA 09 is the mobile version of the annual football game series. The most notable difference from FIFA 08 is that it uses a side-on viewpoint instead of the isometric perspective used since FIFA 2005. The graphics of the game has also been updated with a new animation system and improved framerates. The skill-bars that were introduced in Euro 2008 make their FIFA debut although they are only used for shooting and tackling. New skill-moves such as 360 pirouettes, and step-overs have been added and it's also possible to do one-twos by double-tapping the pass button.

Game modes include training, friendlies, seasons, challenges and penalties. A new feature is called My Team. When first starting the game, the player gets to select a favorite team. The game then tracks everything done with that team, makes it the default team for friendly matches, and customizes all the menus in its colors.

sample_screenshots.caption: Conceding a goal - the manager gets mad

title: FIFA 09

description:
FIFA Street 2 is the mobile game version of the console game. The game plays similarly to the mobile FIFA series but more arcade-oriented and with only four players in each team. More focus lies on performing tricks and by earning points, a special gamebreaker move can be unleashed.

It consists of two game modes: friendly and rule the street. The later mode involves creating a team and play matches to earn cash. The cash can be used to buy players and upgrade the team's abilities. By increasing the team's skill rating the team can enter a cup and compete against various teams at different locations around the world.

sample_screenshots.caption: Rule the street mode - Assigning points

title: FIFA Street 2

description: FIFA Manager 08 is the mobile version of the PC game with the same name. It's the first mobile release in the series and differs from the PC version in that it's entirely text-based. The player can take control of a team from one of ten leagues and has to live up to the board's expectation or risk getting axed. It's possible to buy and sell players, set training focuses, pick a lineup, formation and basic strategy. During matches, what happens is presented with text commentary and the player's interaction is limited to making substitutions and changing formation strategy
title: FIFA Manager 08

description: FIFA Street 3 is a mobile game based on the console game. It is the second mobile game in the FIFA Street series and unlike its predecessor, it's a collection of mini-games and does not contain any real matches. There are six games: volley, target practice, chipping, striker, freestyling, and dribbling. They can be played on their own or as part of a story mode called My FIFA Street. It involves walking around the stages, talking to other freestylers, and accepting challenges.

sample_screenshots.caption: Car breaks down - time for some practicing

title: FIFA Street 3

description: FIFA Manager 10 is the second mobile entry in the series after FIFA Manager 08. The game has largely the same features as its predecessor but adds graphical highlights to the text commentary. New tactical options exist with the player being able to make choices for strategy, passing, and tackling while in training there are different schemes for each position. There are also more ways to interact with players, by praising, encouraging or criticizing them.
title: FIFA Manager 10

description: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa is the official mobile game of the tournament. The game is an adaptation of FIFA 10 and has the same gameplay. The main difference is that it allows the player to play through the full World Cup competition, with or without qualification. When choosing to play the qualification any international team can be selected. There is also an option called My World Cup where the player can enter the competition with any team and where the opposition is randomly chosen. A new game mode is the Free Kick Challenge which consists of 12 rounds with the aim of scoring two free kicks in each. The Be A Pro mode from FIFA 10 is here called National Hero and works mostly the same way.
title: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa

description: FIFA 11 is the mobile version of the annual football game series. The game uses the same game engine as FIFA 10 and has no noticeable gameplay changes. All game modes from FIFA 10 are included: friendly, training, season, virtual pro (was called Be a Pro in FIFA 10), my cup, penalties and multiplayer. It also adds the free kick challenge mode that was introduced in 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa.
title: FIFA 11

description: FIFA 12 is the mobile version of the annual football game series. Compared to FIFA 11, the gameplay is mostly the same but it is played from a more distant camera position with smaller sprites as a result while makes some minor changes to the controls such as the addition of auto-sprint when running. The game modes are the same as in FIFA 11: friendly, training, season, virtual pro, my cup, free kick challenge and penalties. The multiplayer option is however not included.
title: FIFA 12

description: FIFA Manager 12 is the third and last mobile game in the FIFA Manager series. Compared to the previous game, FIFA Manager 10, it has no differences in gameplay, featuring the same game engine and managerial options. It has however added two new leagues the game: the Brazilian and Mexican leagues. They replace the European second division leagues (Championship, Ligue 2, 2. Bundesliga, Serie B and Liga Adelante) which have been removed from the game.
title: FIFA Manager 12

description: FIFA 13 is the mobile version of the annual football game series. Compared to FIFA 12, most of the game is the same. The main new addition is the option to play with assisted or manual passing. In the assisted passing mode, the game automatically chooses whether to play a direct pass or throughball depending on the situation. The game modes are the same as in FIFA 12: friendly, training, season, virtual pro, my cup, free kick challenge and penalties.
title: FIFA 13

description: FIFA 14 is the mobile version of the annual football game series. Apart from updated player and team databases, the game does not have any noticeable differences from FIFA 13. It uses the same game engine and includes the same game modes: friendly, training, season, virtual pro, my cup, free kick challenge and penalties.
title: FIFA 14

description:
UEFA Champions League is an officially licensed football game. Unlike Champions League games on other platforms, it is not based on the FIFA series but is rather an original card-based game. The game uses an isometric game engine like mobile FIFA games of its time, but the player does not have direct control over the players. Instead the player interacts with the game by a set of cards. There are four kinds of cards: pass cards, shoot cards, defend cards and special cards. The player can pause and select a card at any time and the game then continues and the player watches how the action plays out.

The game has three game modes: quick match which is played against a random opponent, competition which is a full Champions League season and fantasy team which is like competition but with a custom built team.
title: UEFA Champions League

description:
UEFA Euro 2008 is the official game of the European Championship of 2008. The game uses the same isometric game engine as FIFA 08 but introduces an all-new control system designed to be suitable for a more casual audience. Movement of players works the same as before, but all other actions (shooting, passing, crossing and tackling) are done with one button. When in the right position, pressing it brings up a slidey bar with a moving pointer. To successfully perform an action it has to be stopped in the green area of the bar.

Game modes include the full Euro 2008 finals as it was played in real life and the My Euro 2008 mode which allows the player to choose from 53 European national teams with either randomized or real-life groups. There are also modes for quick matches and penalty shootouts.
title: UEFA Euro 2008

description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3 is a game in Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six series of tactical shooters.

The player takes control over a team of high-profile specialists working for the international anti-terrorist organization known as Rainbow who responds to a series of terrorist attacks against U.S. interests in South America, apparently being conducted by Islamic terrorists sponsored by Saudi Arabia. However, the true mastermind behind the attacks is actually the newly elected President of Venezuela, Juan Crespo. Crespo managed to get elected by advocating a strong anti-terror platform and exploiting the fear caused by the terrorist attacks (which he himself orchestrated). Crespo's plan is to discredit Saudi Arabia, then cut off the Venezuelan supply of oil to the United States, creating an oil crisis and driving up the price of oil, which he would then sell to the US on the black market at highly inflated prices.

The game maintains gameplay similar to other mobile titles like the point-and-click squad controls and missions' targets like rescuing hostages, disarming bombs and dealing with terrorists enemies in multiple possible ways (i.e. silent from the back or with a bullet in the face).
title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3

description:
Rainbow Six: Lockdown is a mobile game part of the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six game series. In this tactical shooter, the player controls a team of specialists in the fields of anti-terror on a mission against a new international terrorist organization, GLF (Global Liberation Front), who has stolen a nanotech aerosol virus known as Legion and is now threatening the whole world.

Like most mobile games in the series, the overall plot is based on the main console game of the same name. Game missions include rescuing hostages, defusing bombs and destroying terrorists by any means, whether it is sneaking from behind or full-fledged shooting on the spot.
title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown

description: FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006 3D is the second mobile version of FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006. It has the same content and gameplay as the 2D version but instead of the isometric graphics, it uses a 3D game engine that allows for different viewpoints and zoom levels.

sample_screenshots.caption: Zoomed in view of a shot

title: FIFA World Cup: Germany 2006 3D

description: Deep Submarine Odyssey is a 3D mobile game set on the same Kappa planet of the Galaxy on Fire universe by the same developer. It takes place underwater. The player controls a submarine that can freely explore a large environment. There are stations to visit, upgrades to earn as well as new ships, resources to collect, goods to craft and pirates to fight using shooting mechanics from a behind view. After completing all the story missions, you can continue playing in an open world environment where trading is made available as a new gameplay element.
title: Deep: Submarine Odyssey

description: In Heli Strike: Advanced Air Combat the player takes control of a helicopter on nine missions both sea-based and land-based to eliminate the Nerivan forces. On each mission, the player will have surface and air enemies to shoot, power-ups to repair and upgrade the helicopter and a boss vehicle by the end. When a mission is complete, the player is awarded points based on shot accuracy, avoiding damage and how many enemies were destroyed. The final mission requires the boss and missile launch site to be destroyed within a countdown. A mission fails if the helicopter is destroyed or a countdown runs out.
title: Heli Strike: Advanced Air Combat

description:
The mobile port of Kniga Mjortvyh: Poterjannye Dushi adapts the PC original to mobile phones by using less colors for the characters and backgrounds as well as utilizing the lower resolution of the devices available during its time of release. The game is a short, linear Russian visual novel, which takes its inspiration from Lovecraft's works. The game mostly features text for players to read with a few choices players can make which will lead to a Game Over or continue the story. The final choice will decide which of the two endings players will get to see.

As for the plot, the game takes place in the 1920s in the USA. The protagonist, Charles finds out that his uncle Abner had died and left his mansion in Dunwich to his nephew, however, Charles has to move in to the Mansion for one month until the inheritance can take effect. As Charles and his wife stay in the mansion, he finds out more about his uncle's dark secrets.

sample_screenshots.caption: And see how his love went too far...
And her ghost thinks Charles is Abner.
Emily developed a fever and found out more about the inhabitants of the mansion.
The first option is to burn the Necronomicon and the mansion.
Choosing the wrong option can lead to a game over.

title: Kniga Mjortvyh: Poterjannye Dushi

description: In Mr. Nonsense you play as Mr. Nonsense. The goal is to collect as many donuts as possible while killing all living creatures around you. The game takes you to locations such as Wacky Woods and Insane Castle with monsters as enemies.
title: Mr. Nonsense

description:
Munkiki's Castles is a mobile game released exclusively for the Nokia 3410 where players take control of a monkey collecting musical notes in a 3D world.

Munkiki is able to push blocks as well as destroy some of them using his sword. There are also blocks from which Munkiki can bounce away, as well as travelling blocks and blocks that slide on their own after being pushed until they collide with a different block

Each level is considered complete when Munkiki has found all the notes hidden in it and players are free to restart the level in case they get stuck.

Players can switch to a first person view of the surrounding area by pressing * on their phones.

sample_screenshots.caption: We can get on top of the block.
I've just slashed both of them.
When we collect all the musical notes, Munkiki starts clapping his hands.

title: Munkiki's Castles

description:
Donald Duck is urgently called by his uncle Scrooge, forcing him to miss his date with Daisy. Having found Scrooge, Donald finds out that the Beagle Boys have found a way to open Scrooge's safe. Donald goes to find his nephews and, together with them and Scrooge, sets out to capture the Beagle Boys and get back Scrooge's stolen money.

On the surface, Donald Duck's Quest may seem like a ChuChu Rocket! clone as players have indirect control of Donald, Scrooge and Huey, however, the game features notable differences in its gameplay:* Bumping into anything except pushable crates will completely stop the character's movement.

  • If all the characters that can be controlled stop moving, players will need to change the position of the arrows.
  • The game adds locked doors which require keys as well as switches that need to be stepped on once to open a path to the goal.
  • Some levels feature multiple ways to solve them and objects that can be found in the level may not be necessary to complete it.

There are 42 levels to complete in the game, as well as 12 tutorial levels to introduce players to the game's mechanics.

The level is considered complete when Donald Duck or Scrooge touches one of Donald's nephews.

sample_screenshots.caption: Sometimes you don't really need any keys to get the job done.
Thanks for letting me choose for once!

title: Donald Duck's Quest

sample_screenshots.caption: Entering name for high score list

description:
Just as the title suggests, Amy's Adventure is an adventure game released for mobile phones. Players take the role of the young archeologist Amy Goldberg, who is trying to get into an ancient pyramid in Egypt to uncover its secrets. Also, at times, they will control Arthur Zweistein, an aging German researcher who is also tasked with unveiling the secrets of the pyramid and who is the first to experience what the pyramid does to people.

Players control both protagonists directly using direction keys. Players are sometimes hinted when they're close to usable objects and can trigger a menu where they can choose what they want to do with the objects. Players can pick up, combine and use items during their adventures. With the exception of the beginning of the game, which serves as a tutorial for players, the game takes place inside the pyramid, where players will need to solve various puzzles and riddles to progress through the tombs.

sample_screenshots.caption: I can only find ingredients for one of these anyway.
Who knew the Egyptians were fans of waffles?
This machine is sucking the fat out of him. And, out of nowhere, a mummy is chasing you.

title: Amy's Adventure

description:
Croc Mobile: Jungle Rumble! is an isometric platformer starring the green crocodile. Once again, Baron Dante has kidnapped the Gobbos and Croc goes out to rescue them.

Croc can jump and attack enemies by spinning. Freeing the Gobbos will require players to find and use keys scattered throughout the levels.

Keeping up with the times, Croc carries a mobile phone which he can use to communicate with the Gobbos and get hints.

sample_screenshots.caption: We need a key to rescue this fella.

title: Croc Mobile: Jungle Rumble!

description:
Garfield 2: Royal Adventure is an RPG game that follows the plot of the Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties movie. In England, a cat titled Prince XII is meant to inherit a deceased noble's castle, much to the anger of her nephew, Lord Dargis, who decided to get rid of the cat to be the sole inheritor. The game begins with Garfield in the castle, being found and taken for the Prince. Coupled with Winston, the Prince's loyal bulldog servant, they begin an adventure, which will ultimately foil Lord Dargis plans.

All the battles that take place in this game are turn-based. Frightening all the enemies gives the party experience points, which then make the characters level up and upgrade their attacks. All the enemies can be seen on the map and some of them must be defeated to clear the path and progress further along the map.

sample_screenshots.caption: In this case, Garfield "frightens" the spider using the deadly Newspaper :)
Our aim is not to defeat enemies, but to "frighten" them.
The game starts with Garfield being mistaken for Prince XII.

title: Garfield 2: Royal Adventure

description:
Death Trap 2: The Unlocked Code is a horror adventure game for mobile phones. The game takes place in England in 1910. Players take control of Anna, who woke up in a mansion with no memories of who she is and how she got there. To make things worse, the mansion is full of ghosts and phantoms that will not hesitate to kill Anna. Armed with a candle, Anna goes to find a way out of the mansion, as well as clues that can restore her memory.

Players will need to pick up and use objects in the right places to find keys that will allow Anna to progress through the mansion's. There is also a Ship puzzle that can be solved by finding 5 map pieces hidden in the rooms of the mansion. Anna is no warrior, thus, when she is confronted by enemies, they will grab on to her and and players will need to repeatedly tap a button to break free from the enemies. The only way to defeat enemies is to use traps on them. There are various traps for players to find and each trap takes time to work, thus, players need to plan out their attacks in advance and try not to let the enemies get too close to Anna.

sample_screenshots.caption: When Anna is held for too long, she loses health. You can tell by her face that she's in pain.

title: Death Trap 2: The Unlocked Code

description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Ninja Tribunal is an RPG game released for mobile phones. The plot is based on the Lost Episodes of the TV series which bear the same name.

Battles are turn-based and players can choose to attack, defend, do nothing or flee from battle. Later during the game, players unlock new skills which consume chi which can be replenished by having the turtles concentrate in battle.

The game also offers a Battle Mode, which consists of a boss rush.

sample_screenshots.caption: Before jumping to battle, Master Splinter offers to teach you the ropes about fighting enemies.
In this game if you had all the turtles attack the same enemy, then once that enemy is defeated, the rest of the turtles won't attack at all.
The game starts on a ship just like Final Fantasy IV.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Ninja Tribunal

description:
Croc Mobile: Volcanic Panic! is the follow-up to Jungle Rumble! Just like the predecessor, the game is an isometric platformer starring Croc. Baron Dante returns and kidnaps Princess Tara and the other gobbos to stop the King's wedding and Croc has to save the day once more.

Croc can jump and attack enemies by spinning. Freeing the Gobbos will require players to find and use keys scattered throughout the levels.

sample_screenshots.caption: He opens the door for the first level.
There's the Gobbos you need to save and the key to open the cage!
And here's a look at who's going to stop you from saving anyone.

title: Croc Mobile: Volcanic Panic!

description:
Croc Mobile: Pinball is a pinball game connected to the Croc series.

Players use the pads to push the ball around the area and earn points.

Points can be earned by hitting the trees, entering Baron Dante's slot, which will also unlock a power-up: Multi Ball; sliding inside the snake or getting into the heart and key slots.
title: Croc Mobile: Pinball

description:
Samurai Jack: Samurai Showdown is a side-scrolling beat'em'up game released for mobile phones.

Players take control of Samurai Jack, armed with his Katana, who goes out to find and destroy his enemy Aku.

Apart from slashing his enemies, Jack can also run or use a special attack, both of which will drain his chi energy. The terrain can also be used to harm Jack or his enemies, for example, falling into water will kill some of the enemies and sharply decrease Jack's health. In some levels, Jack will also find and be able to shoot enemies using a bow. Landing multiple hits will make combos which add extra points to the player.

There are 15 levels to complete in the game and each enemy has a unique attack pattern to add extra challenge to gamers.

sample_screenshots.caption: The game has dialogues which can be turned off in the options menu.

title: Samurai Jack: Samurai Showdown

description:
Turbo Camels: Circus Extreme is a physics-based puzzle game.

In this game, players control Günther and his camel Baldwin, whose circus act consists of being shot out from a cannon and bounce around the stage collecting objects such as candy, bananas or pumpkins.

The aim of the game is to collect a set amount of objects or all of them and reach the finish line. This is done by first setting the angle and how far players wish to shoot Günther and Baldwin.

After shooting them out of the cannon, bouncing will give the entertainers energy which players can use to boost the two characters into any direction.

This boost will be helpful when trying to get all the candies, as well as when trying to reach the finish line or avoiding traps such as elephants or pandas which make the entertainers less bouncy or bombs, jugglers and penguins which will kill the entertainers on contact. Some levels will also have levers that the entertainers must touch to open an area.

Each level has a time limit to finish it and if the entertainers run out of time or energy and are not moving at all, the level is considered as failed. Some of the levels offer an extra challenge and give more points if certain conditions, such as not using boosters or limiting their use to a certain amount of times are met. There are even levels where players can fly out of bounds.

There are 3 arenas to complete which consist of 5 stages (The first arena having an extra tutorial stage) and each stage is divided into 4 missions (With stage 3 from the second arena adding an extra mission).

Each completed level increases the entertainer's fame and, to get the best result and win a prize, players must get all the objects, as well as complete each level fast enough to get a new High Score.

sample_screenshots.caption: I flew too far from the pool. :(
Before using the cannon, we can have a look around the level to know where to go.
Only the first arena is available in the beginning.

title: Turbo Camels: Circus Extreme

description:
Spectrobes is a Match 3 puzzle game for mobile phones based on the Spectrobes franchise. Rallen had his Prizmod stolen by space pirates and after finally recovering it he finds out that all but one of his Spectrobes are missing. Apparently, the space pirates have also allied themselves with the evil Krawl. With the help of Jeena he is off to defeat them and find the missing Spectrobes.

In the campaign mode, the player can play two types of levels. These are Spectrobe levels and Krawl levels. In the Spectrobe levels several meters at the bottom of the screen have to be filled with the corresponding minerals in the playing field. The player has to match three identical minerals to fill them. To do this he has to pick an empty spot in the playing field and choose a direction to move it in. The entire row will then move in that direction. All the meters have to be filled before the time runs out.

In the Krawl level the player has to fight a Krawl by matching three minerals. Some minerals will heal the player while others will slow the Krawls attack down or let the Spectrobe attack the Krawl. Along the way, the player will retrieve the missing Spectrobes. Before starting a level, the player can choose the Spectrobe he wants to use for the match. Between the levels the player has to use his spaceship to get from one level to another by maneuvering it in all four directions.

Besides the campaign mode, the game offers the following modes:* Quick play

  • Single match
  • Survival
  • Create a Level
title: Spectrobes

description:
The J2ME edition of Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 features a few differences and limitations from the other versions due to the different hardware of the mobile devices of the time.

These limitations are:

  • Depending on the device, players have a choice of 3 to 6 available fighters with Shao Kahn being playable from the start for some of the weaker devices and being unlockable after clearing the Master Tower on Hard difficulty in the more advanced versions.
  • Having only two keys for attacking.
  • The Arcade mode featuring only the fighters available in the version played.
  • Players can choose to either play the game with some of the original game's sound effects, or with music.
  • On touch screen devices, the game runs in a box with the controls being on both sides.
  • The storyline of the game being available from the Help menu.
  • Each character having only one fatality and one babality.

sample_screenshots.caption: A bit of backstory before the fight begins.
And offers a choice of the battle plan.

title: Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3

description:
VANS Skate & Slam feat. Geoff Rowley is the sequel to Skate & Slam which, apart from the brand and celebrity endorsement, offers players 18 stages in Barcelona and Huntington Beach to skate and do tricks in.

Playing as Geoff, players will need to help him get noticed by VANS and sign a deal with them. This is done by going from left to right, doing the tricks that your agent tells you to do when prompted or by clearing the level with a set amount of points or more. Points are obtained when players land a trick and combining a few tricks will multiply their points for it.

The game allows players to do ollies, nollies, flip tricks, grinds and manuals.

There's also a Free Tour mode where players can choose any of the levels they've already completed and beat the highscore in them.

sample_screenshots.caption: Barcelona! It was the first time that we met.
Collect VANS signs to clear this level.

title: Vans Skate & Slam feat. Geoff Rowley

description:
Snowball Fight is, as the title suggests, an action game where players take control of a boy who throws snowballs at his peers and other creatures. The aim of the game is to become the Snowball King, which means players must beat all the other characters using snowballs.

The game starts on an area map where players have access to the first stage titled Eastern Boys, as well as to an Item Shop where they can buy limited use special weapons which can temporarily stun enemies or freeze them in place, and a Drugstore where players can buy items to restore their health during tough snowball fights.

During combat, pressing 5 once will lock the protagonist in shooting position, while the second press, depending on the timing, will adjust how far the snowball will fly.

sample_screenshots.caption: You get gold regardless whether you win or lose the fight, but losing gives you only 3 coins.
An extra ad for Samsung's service.

title: Snowball Fight

description:
Cowboys & Aliens is a 2D action game for mobile phones based on the graphic novel of the same name. As they escort a stagecoach to Silver City, cowboys Zeke and Verity are attacked by Apache Indians while passing through their country. While fighting his way through the Apache camp Zeke witnesses the abduction of some Apache warriors by a UFO. Soon after this, the place is swarming with aliens and Zeke has to find out what is going on.

In the game players control the cowboy Zeke. The gameplay includes running on foot and gunning down various enemies, including native Americans and aliens. Enemies use both range and melee weapons. Jake also has a whip which he can use to pull enemies closer and finish them off or ripping away their shield. The whip can also be used for swinging over gaps. In some sections, the player will ride a horse, bison or alien craft. The game also has a section on a moving train where Zeke has to evade traps and sneak past guards. Three difficulty levels are offered.
title: Cowboys & Aliens

description:
Assassin's Creed: Revelations is a 2D action platform game for mobile phones based on the better known 3D action game. In this game, players assume the role of both Ezio and Altaïr. Ezio's story takes place in Constantinople in 1511 A.D., where he is on a mission to retrieve the key to the lost Library of the Assassins. Altaïr's story takes place in 1191 A.D. He seeks revenge on his master for betraying him for one of the Pieces of Eden.

Gameplay includes mostly 2D side-scrolling platforming and defeating enemies with a sword. Enemies can be attacked directly or the player can try to take them by surprise and kill them with one move. Some levels are played from a top down perspective similar to a shoot 'em up game with Leonardo Da Vinci's flying machine.
title: Assassin's Creed: Revelations

description:
The mobile version of Marc Ecko's Getting Up is a side-scrolling platformer where players control the urban graffiti artist Trane and help him build his reputation in the oppressed city of New Radius. However, with Civil Conduct Keepers machines on his trail, it won't be an easy task.

The aim of the game is to collect spray cans that will illuminate the dark city. Then, when players find and pick up an X, they start tagging the area and that is also done by collecting spray cans. The level is considered complete as soon as players collect all the spray cans necessary to leave a tag. Then, the game calculates Trane's reputation based on the amount of spray cans Trane collected. This needs to be done while avoiding laser beams from security cameras and being out of sight of CCK flyers and helicopters.

Trane can wall jump and do a ducking slide to get to areas that are impossible to access in the conventional way.

Spray cans come in different colors:* Orange spray cans.

  • Red ones, which need to be picked up in a specific order.
  • Blue ones which require Trane to stand beside them for a short time before they are picked up.
  • Purple ones which start a timer as soon as the first one is picked up and must be picked up in a limited amount of time.
  • Green ones which share the traits of the Red and purple ones.

There are 27 levels with three difficulty modes for each level players will complete. Each consecutive difficulty level is unlocked after clearing the previous one.

sample_screenshots.caption: That didn't turn out so bad.
Karen Light, the journalist, gives hints to players about what street artists can do in the game.
Now I must collect spray cans to do my own graffiti.

title: Marc Ecko's Getting Up

description:
Vampires Dawn: Deceit of Heretics is a mobile game and a part of the popular German Vampires Dawn series.

Unlike the PC games, this game models its combat after Tactical RPGs. Players can control a party of up to 4 characters and are able to attack enemies only if they are within their weapons and magic range. Blood acts as MP in this game for vampires, allowing players to use magic or suck the blood of human enemies in battle to restore it. As for the skeletons, their equivalent is soul power which can be replenished by killing enemies and human NPCs.

In cities, apart from talking to NPCs and accepting side-quests from them, players can opt to transform humans into runes and objects that will aid them in battle, steal items from them (If they master the skill), as well as suck their blood. Sucking blood from humans will restore each Vampire's MP. Players can stop the blood sucking at any time to keep the human alive.

Levelling up gives players talent points which they can spend on improving various types of skills, such as stealing, sucking blood, seeing hidden passages and things, raising stats and mastering new spells.

The game starts off with players taking control of Lara, a little girl, whose mother urges her to run away from her father who turned into a vampire and is planning to kill both of them. Unfortunately for the girl, the vampire catches up to them and kills Lara's mother, but is interrupted by Vince Neras and his skeleton servants before he can kill his own daughter. Lara joins Vince in his fight against the human crusade, hoping to find her father, as well as her mother, whose corpse had gone missing.

The lower end devices received a simplified port where the game is constantly in combat mode with the story unfolding through dialogues. In these versions, experience is given to the character who delivered the finishing blow to an enemy.

sample_screenshots.caption: This battle's rigged! We didn't get any experience for it.
World map. Being a bat simplifies moving for us.

title: Vampires Dawn: Deceit of Heretics

description: Cluster Pirate is a basic match-three puzzle game in the style of the original Bejeweled. Played on an 8x8 grid, the objective is to remove tiles from the board by matching adjacent tiles into rows of three or more. As matches are made, the player scores points, and the tiles are removed and replaced by other tiles falling from the top. Extra points are given for chain reactions and longer formations. The game is on time but matches increase the time bar and when it reaches the top a bonus is given.
title: Cluster Pirate

description: Asteroid Zone is an adaptation of the arcade game Asteroids for early J2ME mobile devices. Like in the original, the player steers a spacecraft around the screen and has to blast asteroids to pieces. Shooting an asteroid splits it into smaller ones and points are scored for each hit. Lives are lost when colliding with one of the rocks and when out of lives the game is over and the player gets to enter initials for a high score.
title: Asteroid Zone

description:
Hero of Sparta is an 2D action game for mobile phone set in a fictional ancient Greece. King Argos of Sparta is leading a campaign against an evil cult that has corrupted Greece by destroying their temples. Now on the threshold of victory he stands before the last idol of the cult, determined to destroy it for once and for all. Before he is able to destroy it a great evil takes possession of the idol and speaks to him. He is told that from this day forth his fate belong to the great evil. After quickly destroying the idol Argos escapes the collapsing temple and sails off with his fleet. On the way home is knocked over board and is washed ashore on an unknown island.

In the game the player controls Argos and has to beat-up various animals, skeletons and mythological creatures. The game switches between a births eye and side view perspective. Side view sections usually involve platforming. Various locations are visited including Atlantis, the underworld and Olympus. During the game several bosses have to be fought including a Cyclops and Cerberus.

iPhone, Android and several other platforms received a different 3D game.
title: Hero of Sparta

description:
Eragon is an 2D action game for mobile phone based on the 2006 fantasy movie of the same name. Once dragon riders protected the world but after losing a war against the Empire they fanished and hid the last of the dragon eggs away. Now the empire and rebels are trying to find out where the last eggs are. The game starts with Durza, a dark wizard from the Empire cornering the elven princess Arya. He is after the dragon egg she is carrying but before capturing the elven princess she manges to teleport the egg far away. The egg is later found by a boy named Eragon. After the Empire has destroyed his village he and the dragon are off to take revenge on the Empire.

In the game the player controls Eragon and has to beat-up the forces of the Empire with his sword. Eragon can also call upon his dragon Saphira for help. The dragon then burns the enemies on screen with her breath. Along the way potions for replenishing health can be found. In some section the player controls Saphira and has to burn enemies standing on towers while flying through the air.

sample_screenshots.caption: I have to choose a reward

title: Eragon

description:
Watchmen is an 2D beat 'em up game for mobile phone based based on the comic book series of the same name. The game starts in 1965 New York, with Nite Owl in pursuit of a crime lord named Big Figure. The second story takes place in 1971 Vietnam where Comedian is bolstering the American troops. Later on the time line jumps to 1977 New York in the mists of a police strikes.

In the game the player controls Nite Owl and later on Comedian and has to beat-up gang members, soldiers and street scum. Enemies use hand to hand combat or are armed with weapons like knives and guns. It is possible to take a weapons from the enemy and use it against them. Along the way med packs can be found as well as objects like crates that can be thrown at the enemies. The player also has a limited number of grenades. In some parts of the game the player controls Nite Owl's airship and has to shoot down a helicopter. Besides the story mode there is also a survival mode.

sample_screenshots.caption: Beating-up some scum in a minefield (red dot)

title: Watchmen

description:
The mobile version of skate. is a side-scrolling skateboarding game. In this game, players can do such tricks as ollies, manuals, wallrides, spin tricks, handplants and lip stalls, Indy and Kickflip, spine transfers, as well as a few types of grind tricks.

When doing grinds or manuals, players will be repeatedly prompted to press Up or Down and failing to do that in time will make them bail and lose any points they could've gotten if they landed the trick or the combo they were trying to do.

Successfully pulling off tricks and combos will fill in a meter that when half or completely full allows players to activate "Footy Time". This will slow down the speed of the skater and add a trail effect to the skater's movement. Footy time allows players to squeeze extra tricks while they are in the air.

The game features two gameplay modes: Thrasher Mode*, where players complete various missions with the ultimate goal of winning the Thrasher Skater of the Year award.

  • Free Skate, where players can skate to their hearts delight on the areas they've unlocked while playing through the Thrasher Mode.

As players beat the challenges of the Thrasher Mode, they will unlock Media Clippings in their Scrapbook and be able to see the records they've achieved during gameplay.

In total, there are 12 Chapters to complete in the Thrasher Mode with 4 missions in each chapter taking place in 3 areas: Plaza, Halfpipe and Downtown.

sample_screenshots.caption: Doing an Airwalk in Free Skate mode.
Each Chapter has 4 missions for players to complete.
And drops you into the Thrasher Mode.
Some of the missions will involve collecting items or grinding specific spots to leave a tag on them.

title: skate.

description:
Yamakasi Masters is a parkour running game featuring members of the French group.

The aim of the game is to win the parkour championship and that will be accomplished by completing various objectives within a strict time limit.

Apart from the Adventure mode, players can choose the Challenge mode to compete for the best time, most points for tricks or the best overall score. Scores could be uploaded to the developer's website. The Free Run mode is, in essence, a practice mode where players are not limited in time to travel around the city and pull off tricks. The bonus levels are unlocked if players complete levels following special conditions.

As players complete levels in the Adventure mode, they will unlock new tricks to jump over obstacles in style. Apart from jumping, players will need to keep their balance on some objects to jump even further.

sample_screenshots.caption: Pulling off more advanced tricks while sprinting.

title: Yamakasi Masters

description:
Sexy Babes: Wild Waterslides is best described as a button tapping game.

Players pick one of the girls to play as and are prompted to press the up, down, left, right and 5 buttons when the girl is running or sliding. Pressing the right button in time increases the speed of the protagonist, while pressing the wrong button or pressing it too early/too late decreases the speed and gives no points.

Players need to slide all the way into the pool before the time is up and they also need to get a minimal score to complete the level and unlock the next one. Beating a level also unlocks additional bikinis for the girls.

During each level, there are areas where players time their button press to take a good photo of the sliding girl. After the level is complete, players can choose to save the photos they had taken to their photo album.

sample_screenshots.caption: And another animation after the spinning part.
Let's play with the first girl available.

title: Sexy Babes: Wild Waterslides

description:
The Dark Knight Rises is a 2D action platform game for mobile phones based on the 2012 movie of the same name. In this game the player assume the role of both Batman and Catwomen and has to thwart the evil plans of Bane the muzzle wearing bad guy.

Gameplay includes mostly 2D side-scrolling platforming and defeating enemies with hand to hand combat. Enemies can be attacked directly or the player can try to take them by surprise and kill them with one move. Some levels are played from a top down perspective similar to a shoot 'em up game with Batman on a motorcycle. Catwoman has sections in which she runs automatically and has to evade, doge and jump over obstacles and knock over enemies.

iPhone, iPad and Android and several other platforms received a different 3D game.
title: The Dark Knight Rises

description:
Scooby-Doo! in Jeepers Creepers! is a mobile game where players must help the gang solve a mystery.

The game consists of 3 sub-games:* Playing as Shaggy, players go through a mansion or a mine with a randomly generated layout and must examine objects to find clues. They also need to hide from ghosts and zombies and locate keys to unlock doors and scooby snacks to replenish Shaggy's health.

  • Playing as Velma, players have 30 seconds to memorize all the suspects and then they must choose the villain based on Velma's description of their facial features.
  • Playing as Scooby, players are being chased by the monster so they must ride the Mystery Machine or a mine cart to the end of the level, avoiding potholes and fallen trees.

The game offers some replay value as the difficulty of each new game is increased, offering more floors for the mansion part, different character portraits for the memory game and a longer level for the chase game with each successive playthrough.

sample_screenshots.caption: Help Velma choose the villain based on her description.
Starting area for the first game.

title: Scooby-Doo! in Jeepers Creepers!
Destroy All Humans! Crypto Does Vegas

description:
Dirk Nowitzki's 2on2 is a basketball game for 2 players. You have Training, Single Game, Tournament, Dunking Contest to choose in the menu.

The game can make screenshots of you playing to send to your friends as MMS messages.
title: Dirk Nowitzki's 2on2

description: Bad Girls Dormitory is an action game set in a girls dormitory. You play as a guy who wants to get all the girls in the dorm in your bed. You collect keys to get into the dorm and items to shoot enemies. This game has eight levels: streets, corridors, bedrooms and rooms. There are eight enemies: janitors, sinister grannies and dorm superintendents.
title: Bad Girls Dormitory

description:
Wild West Guns is a 2D action for mobile phone set in the Wild West. The game starts with the players character Jack Barnes being kick out of a hotel in Silverdale for cheating at a cards game. After beating up the guy that is accusing him of cheating Jack can't remember how he got to Silverdale. He then notices his satchel and money is gone to pay for his brothers release from jail and is of to see the sheriff.

In the game the player has to explore the Wild West and has to complete missions like saving the sheriff from outlaws and apprehending criminals. The player can travel by foot or by horse between locations. Earned money can be used to buy better guns. This game is not to be confused with the 2008 Wii and 2009 iPhone game bearing the same name.

sample_screenshots.caption: I am wanted now. I guess I should not have shot that guy for no reason

title: Wild West Guns

description:
The Mask of Loki, a magical mask that bestows all the powers of the god of mischief upon whoever wears it, has fallen into the hands of hapless American cartoonist Tim Avery. While wearing the mask, Tim conceives a son, Alvey, with his wife. Due to the... unique circumstances of his conception, Alvey is born with Loki's powers. Loki's father, Odin, sends the trickster god to recover the mask and put an end to the chaos that the mask has caused on Earth. As Alvey, you must use your powers to find a way to escape from the madness.

Son of the Mask is a side-scrolling platformer based on the fantasy comedy film of the same name. The objective is to reach the exit of each level, avoiding being injured by enemies along the way. Alvey can collect power-ups such as magic balloons that will inflate his head to enable him to fly, baby bottles that replenish health, and gumball projectiles that can be used to defeat enemies from a distance. Alvey can also defeat enemies by bouncing on their heads and can dash in either direction as well as break through weak floors by turning into a cartoonish tornado.
title: Son of the Mask

description: Billy the Kid: Wanted is an action shooter with an Old West setting. The player takes control of a sheriff in a scrolling environment shown using a bird's-eye perspective as he chases down Billy the Kid and his accomplices near the US and Mexican frontier.
title: Billy the Kid: Wanted

description:
Sid Meier's Civilization V: The Mobile Game is a turn based strategy game for mobile phone based on the better known PC game of the same name.

In the game the player takes control of one of twenty civilization and has to lead them through seven ages starting in the stone age all the way through to the space age. The twenty civilizations to choose from are: America, Arabia, Aztec, Babylon, China, Egypt, England, France, Germany, Greece, India , Iroquois, Japan, Mongolia, Ottoman, Persia, Rome, Russia, Siam and Songhai. Each civilization has a leader that gives the nation a specific advantage. Like Otto von Bismarck for Germany, Alexander the great for Greece and Genis Khan for Mongolia.

In the game the player has to develop and protect his settlement by training workers and warriors. The worker can built building like a farm and a mine. Warriors are used to defend the settlement from hostile neighbours. Diplomacy is also an option.
title: Sid Meier's Civilization V: The Mobile Game

description:
When the Destruction Demon broke the seal of his dungeon, the world plunged into the darkness. And then the temple monks gathered the saint stone knights and put them in charge of the mission to find the divine crystal sphere which will help to get the demon back to his dungeon.

Saint Stone Knights Legend is an action RPG with a bird's-eye view. You can use melee weapons or magic spells to fight enemies. There are three classes (knight, warrior, priest) and ability points that can be distributed over different abilities after levelling up.
title: Saint Stone Knights Legend

description:
Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi DX is the first feature phone adaptation of the arcade game Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi. Like the original game, Ketsui features a dark post-apocalyptic setting. In a world ravaged by climate change, the arms dealer EVAC Industries has been stoking tension between world powers to fuel weapons sales. A secret UN squadron is deployed in a last-ditch effort to eliminate EVAC and bring some form of peace to the world. Players have a choice between two different ships; the slow-moving Tiger Schwert has a wide shot, while the fast-moving Panzer Jäger has a focused shot. Both ships feature a lock-on mode; by holding down the shot button, the player shoots a tightly focused laser and the player's support ships lock onto the nearest enemy, allowing the player to strafe while continuing to shoot.

This adaptation features only three of the original game's five stages and simplified artwork, both of which were addressed in the Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi DX rerelease the next year.
title: Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi

description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Shredder Reborn is a direct sequel to Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Ninja Tribunal. Just like the first game it is based on The Lost Episodes, or the Ninja Tribunal Season, the fifth season of the 2003 TV series.

The gameplay is the same. You control four turtles to fight the enemies and bosses in turn-based combat. New puzzle-elements are added. It is possible to transfer the team from the original game by entering a code provided after beating the first game.
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Shredder Reborn

description:
Slither is the classic Snake game with a few twists. Each level you must gain a specific length before moving onto the next one. There are various food items to pick up and avoid and as in the original game the walls cannot be touched.

A high score system is used with an option to upload scores and compete against friends. Four numeric keys are used for movement. Devices that support pointers can use that to control movement.
title: Slither

description:
Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events is a puzzle adventure game based on the 2004 theatrical film of the same name, which in turn is based on the first three instalments in the series of children's novels of the same name. Players assume the role of the three Baudelaire orphans (Violet, Klaus, and Sunny) and must use the unique talents of each child to foil their evil guardian Count Olaf's plot to steal their family inheritance.

Players can switch between control of each of the three orphans at any time in order to use their unique abilities to solve the puzzles in each chapter. Violet is the tallest of the orphans and can combine objects to create new contraptions; Klaus is the strongest of the orphans and an avid reader; and Sunny can fit into tight spaces that her siblings cannot due to her small size and can bite items with her four powerful teeth. The game contains five levels set in three locations.
title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events

description: Stuart Little 2: Air Adventure is a flying game based on the Stuart Little license where Stuart has to control a plane to look for his friend, Margalo. You hold a button to make the plane go up and leave it to make it go down, while you avoid birds and collect power-ups like hearts (health) and tickets (speed up), occasionally fighting a hawk.
title: Stuart Little 2: Air Adventure

description: The Legend of Zorro is a 2D side-scrolling game where you run to the end of the level beating enemies with your sword and swinging your whip as Zorro. There are also other mechanics like explosives you can use. The game is a tie-in for the movie The Legend of Zorro.
title: The Legend of Zorro

sample_screenshots.caption: A Sonic statue. It uses artwork from Sonic Unleashed.

description:
Ancient Empires is a turn-based strategy game in which the player takes the role of King Galamar. His twin brother Valadorn has turned against him and is about to capture the Kingdom of Thorin. Starting from one remaining castle, allowing him to still recruit troops and earn gold, he must reclaim his lands and defeat the usurper.

The game is divided over different missions where the player each time has to build up their army by conquering castles and townhouses, which produce gold and heal troops. Possible units vary from warriors and archers to mystical creatures such as lizard men, gollums and dragons. The goal of each level differs, but is usually seeking out a character, destroying everyone, or reaching a certain area.

A skirmish mode allows players to challenge a friend in a 2-player battle.
title: Ancient Empires

description:
Ancient Empires II is a turn-based strategy game and the successor to Ancient Empires. The story picks up right where the first game left off. King Galamar has defeated his usurping brother Valadorn, who turned out to be possessed by a demon named Saeth . Now the two brothers must join forces to keep some magical gems out of the hands of Saeth and prevent him from conquering the kingdom of Thorin.

The game features eight missions in which the player has to build up their army by conquering castles and townhouses, which produce gold and heal troops. Soldiers and archers make their return, but some units have been replaced, like sorceresses for magicians.

Besides the story and skirmish modes, there is now also a level select mode.
title: Ancient Empires II

description:
The Da Vinci Code: Helix is is one of four mobile games based on Dan Brown's book The Da Vinci Code and its 2006 movie adaptation. The player takes on the role of an applicant seeking to join the secretive Priory of Sion by completing a series of puzzle challenges throughout France and England.

Gameplay incorporates the bubble shooter genre introduced in popular games of the era such as Zuma. The player moves their targeting reticle left or right along the bottom of the screen and shoots colored bubbles toward long rows of bubbles that move along predetermined tracks. As in most match-tree puzzle games, the player must connect three or more bubbles of the same color in order to clear them from the level and score points. Each level is completed when the all of the bubbles are removed from the level. Special bonuses are granted for clearing many bubbles in a short period, including the ability to shoot bolts of lightning or remove all bubbles of a specific color from the level.
title: The Da Vinci Code: Helix

description:
Angels & Demons is a mobile game based on the novel by Dan Brown and its subsequent 2009 movie adaptation. The game takes place in and around Vatican City as symbologist Robert Langdon attempts to stop the murders of Catholic cardinals while progressing through levels of increasingly challenging puzzles.

Gameplay is based on a puzzle game known as marble solitaire in which the player must clear rows of marbles by jumping a marble from one end to the other, and continuously removing marbles until only one or a few remain. This mobile game introduces a scoring system in which the player receives a higher score for removing multiple marbles with one jump, and elemental marbles which grant bonus points when like marbles are removed together. There is also a level type in which the player must end the level with the final marbles in a specific tile.
title: Angels & Demons

description: Sea Hunter is an classic simple game. We play as a submarine, and launch torpedoes at ships. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible.
title: Sea Hunter
Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Quest for Oz

sample_screenshots.caption: Select a race. Two still need to be unlocked.
Start of the first round (Spanish version)

description: Submarine is a simple arcade-style game. The player controls a submarine which is automatically moving forward in an underwater tunnel with obstacles. The game is controlled with a single button. The submarine is rapidly descending if the button is not pressed. By pressing and holding the button, the player makes the submarine go up and controls it's height, a concept similar to Flappy Bird and countless other games. The game has no ending, and the goal is to get a high score.
title: Submarine

sample_screenshots.caption: The station where the game starts.
A sequence where you need to press buttons quickly to shake off the enemy.
The start of the first level at a crash site

description: King Kong: The 8th Wonder of the World - Pinball Game is a pinball game for mobile phones, developed as a loose tie-in game for Peter Jackson's King Kong movie. It consists of a single pinball table. The main goal is to rack up as many points as possible, while lighting up the letters K-I-N-G K-O-N-G. This grants a big bonus and is essentially the main objective of the game.

sample_screenshots.caption: The bottom part of the table, before launching a ball.
The top part of the table

title: King Kong: The 8th Wonder of the World - Pinball Game

sample_screenshots.caption: Distribute points for your starting character.
It can get a little hectic.
Waiting for a rock to drop.

description: Call of Duty 3 for mobile phones is a two-dimensional adaptation of the console game of the same name. In eight missions, players control soldiers of the American, British, Canadian and Polish armies during the Battle of Normandy in the summer of 1944. Every mission is a loose adaptation of a level from the console version. Gameplay is objective-based: a commanding officer gives orders that must be completed to finish the mission; markers indicate where the current objective lies. Orders might include attacking enemies, capturing machine gun nests, escorting tanks or defusing explosives. Gameplay mechanics are patterned after the console version: enemies can be targeted for higher accuracy, the player character can switch between standing and crouching positions and use the latter to take cover behind barriers, and health is replenished automatically if not attacked for a while.

sample_screenshots.caption: The prologue is an interactive tutorial.
You need to follow the orders of your sergeant.

title: Call of Duty 3

sample_screenshots.caption: A description of the objective for the first mission
Sneaking up on an enemy in the grass.

description: Play as Harry and work together with Hermione and Ron to search for Horcruxes while battling Death Eaters and Dementors using 20 different spells learned along the way. Progression involves puzzle solving and collecting magical artifacts. Main objective is to find and destroy Horcruxes and ultimately defeat Voldemort.
title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

description: This is an action-adventure game set in the world of Harry Potter. Players can roam around Hogwarts and interact with various characters from the movie, such as Ron, Hermione, Dumbledore, and Hagrid. The game allows players to engage in duels by casting spells against other students, familiar foes, and Death Eaters. As players explore the magical halls of Hogwarts, they can discover and trade magical objects, as well as unlock secrets and mysteries within the castle.
title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
Brothers in Arms: Art of War
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 - The Mobile Game

description:
Star Wars: Jedi Mind Tricks is a match-three puzzle game based on the Star Wars license.

Unlike in Bejeweled and similar titles, adjacent tokens on the board are not flipped but instead one token is thrown to the edge of the board, with the remaining tiles shifting accordingly. Matching three of the same removes them from the board, matching four removes the entire column or row and matching five gains the player an extra turn.

Tokens include Force and Attack tokens that come in three colors: blue, green and red. Blue tokens favor Jedi, red tokens favor Sith and green ones work equally for both sides. Special tokens include crates that can be moved but not matched, thermal detonators that explode when thrown and remove all adjacent tokens, and bacta tanks which heal the player when matched.

There are two types of game: challenge and battle. In challenges, the goal is to remove a given number of tokens of each color in a limited number of turns. Battles are duels against another character and are won by depleting the enemy of their health. This is done by removing attack tokens, but attacking reduces the Force rush meter. Removing Force tokens increases the Force rush meter, that when full, increases the damage multiplier. Attempting an illegal move that won't result in removed tokens also reduces the Force rush.
